trans-unit.source: New in pygame 2.0.0: Optional special_flags: BLEND_ALPHA_SDL2 - Uses the SDL2 blitter for alpha blending, this gives different results than the default blitter, which is modelled after SDL1, due to different approximations used for the alpha blending formula. The SDL2 blitter also supports RLE on alpha blended surfaces which the pygame one does not.
trans-unit.target: pygame 2.0.0的新增功能：可选的 special_flags ： BLEND_ALPHA_SDL2 -使用SDL2阻击器进行Alpha混合，这与默认阻击器（以SDL1为模型）的默认阻击器产生不同的结果，这是因为Alpha混合公式使用的近似值不同。SDL2阻击器还支持Alpha混合曲面上的RLE，而pygame则不支持。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you called Sound.play(n) or Channel.play(sound,n), the end event is sent only once: after the sound has been played "n+1" times (see the documentation of Sound.play).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您调用了 Sound.play(n) 或 Channel.play(sound,n) ，则结束事件仅发送一次：在声音播放“ n + 1”次之后（请参阅Sound.play文档） 。

trans-unit.source: Note that in pygame 2, joysticks events use a unique "instance ID". The device index passed in the constructor to a Joystick object is not unique after devices have been added and removed. You must call Joystick.get_instance_id() to find the instance ID that was assigned to a Joystick on opening.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在pygame 2中，操纵杆事件使用唯一的“实例ID”。添加和删​​除设备后，构造函数中传递给Joystick对象的设备索引不是唯一的。您必须调用 Joystick.get_instance_id() 才能找到打开时分配给操纵杆的实例ID。

trans-unit.source: Note that pygame does not automatically import pygame.gfxdraw, so you need to import pygame.gfxdraw before using it.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,pygame不会自动导入pygame.gfxdraw,所以在使用前需要导入pygame.gfxdraw。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Font class does not automatically determine script orientation. Vertical layout must be selected explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， Font 类不会自动确定脚本方向。垂直布局必须明确选择。

trans-unit.source: Note that the freetype module depends on the FreeType 2 library. It will not compile with the original FreeType 1.0. Hence, the first element of the tuple will always be "2".
trans-unit.target: 请注意， freetype 模块取决于FreeType 2库。它不会与原始的FreeType 1.0一起编译。因此，元组的第一个元素将始终为“ 2”。

trans-unit.source: Note that the WINDOWEVENT API is considered experimental, and may change in future releases.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,WINDOWEVENT API被认为是实验性的,在未来的版本中可能会改变。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is no Image class; an image is loaded as a Surface object. The Surface class allows manipulation (drawing lines, setting pixels, capturing regions, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 请注意,没有Image类,图像是作为Surface对象加载的。Surface类可以进行操作(画线、设置像素、捕捉区域等)。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function uses pygame.time.delay(), which uses lots of CPU in a busy loop to make sure that timing is more accurate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此函数使用 pygame.time.delay() ，它在繁忙循环中使用大量CPU以确保计时更准确。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function uses SDL_Delay function which is not accurate on every platform, but does not use much CPU. Use tick_busy_loop if you want an accurate timer, and don't mind chewing CPU.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,这个函数使用SDL_Delay函数,虽然在每个平台上都不准确,但并不会占用太多的CPU。如果你想要一个精确的定时器,并且不介意浪费CPU,就用tick_busy_loop。

trans-unit.target: 注意，请记住在此函数之前调用 pygame.event.get() 。否则它将无法按预期工作。

trans-unit.target: 注意:缓冲区将被内部复制,它和声音对象之间不会共享数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: under MS Windows, the window that has the mouse focus also has the keyboard focus. But under X-Windows, one window can receive mouse events and another receive keyboard events. pygame.mouse.get_focused() indicates whether the pygame window receives mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在 MS Windows 下，具有鼠标焦点的窗口也具有键盘焦点。但是在X-Windows下，一个窗口可以接收鼠标事件，另一个窗口可以接收键盘事件。 pygame.mouse.get_focused() 指示pygame窗口是否接收到鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: On MacOSX when a file is opened using a pygame application, a USEREVENT with its code attribute set to pygame.USEREVENT_DROPFILE is generated. There is an additional attribute called filename where the name of the file being accessed is stored.
trans-unit.target: 在MacOSX上，使用pygame应用程序打开文件时，将 USEREVENT 一个USEREVENT，其 code 属性设置为 pygame.USEREVENT_DROPFILE 。还有一个名为 filename 的附加属性，用于存储要访问的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: On a PC the user can specify a default device by setting an environment variable. To use device #1, for example:
trans-unit.target: 在PC上,用户可以通过设置一个环境变量来指定一个默认设备。例如,要使用设备#1。

trans-unit.source: On each OS and version of Python the location will be slightly different. For example on Windows it might be in 'C:/Python26/Lib/site-packages/pygame/examples/' On Mac OS X it might be in '/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pygame/examples/'
trans-unit.target: 在每个操作系统和 Python 版本上,位置会略有不同。例如在 Windows 上,它可能在 'C:/Python26/Lib/site-packages/pygame/examples/' 在 Mac OS X 上,它可能在 '/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pygame/examples/' 中。

trans-unit.source: On high resolution displays(4k, 1080p) and tiny graphics games (640x480) show up very small so that they are unplayable. SCALED scales up the window for you. The game thinks it's a 640x480 window, but really it can be bigger. Mouse events are scaled for you, so your game doesn't need to do it.
trans-unit.target: 在高分辨率显示器上(4k,1080p)和微小的图形游戏(640x480)显示非常小,因此它们无法播放。SCALED可以为你放大窗口。游戏认为这是一个640x480的窗口,但实际上它可以更大。鼠标事件是为你缩放的,所以你的游戏不需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: On high resolution displays(4k, 1080p) and tiny graphics games (640x480) show up very small so that they are unplayable. SCALED scales up the window for you. The game thinks it's a 640x480 window, but really it can be bigger. Mouse events are scaled for you, so your game doesn't need to do it. Note that SCALED is considered an experimental API and may change in future releases.
trans-unit.target: 在高分辨率显示器上(4k,1080p)和微小的图形游戏(640x480)显示非常小,因此它们无法播放。SCALED可以为你放大窗口。游戏认为这是一个640x480的窗口,但实际上它可以更大。鼠标事件是为你缩放的,所以你的游戏不需要这样做。请注意,SCALED被认为是一个实验性的API,可能会在未来的版本中改变。

trans-unit.source: On some platforms it is possible to embed the pygame display into an already existing window. To do this, the environment variable SDL_WINDOWID must be set to a string containing the window id or handle. The environment variable is checked when the pygame display is initialized. Be aware that there can be many strange side effects when running in an embedded display.
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上，可以将pygame显示内容嵌入到现有窗口中。为此，必须将环境变量 SDL_WINDOWID 设置为包含窗口ID或句柄的字符串。初始化pygame显示时，将检查环境变量。请注意，在嵌入式显示器中运行时可能会有许多奇怪的副作用。

trans-unit.source: On some platforms there are multiple audio drivers available and this allows users to pick between them. More information is available here. Must be set before calling pygame.init() or pygame.mixer.init().
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上，有多个音频驱动程序可用，这使用户可以在它们之间进行选择。可在此处获得更多信息。必须在调用 pygame.init() 或 pygame.mixer.init() 之前进行设置。

trans-unit.source: On some platforms there are multiple video drivers available and this allows users to pick between them. More information is available here. Must be set before calling pygame.init() or pygame.display.init().
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上，有多个视频驱动程序可用，这使用户可以在它们之间进行选择。可在此处获得更多信息。必须在调用 pygame.init() 或 pygame.display.init() 之前进行设置。

trans-unit.source: Once the display Surface is created, the functions from this module affect the single existing display. The Surface becomes invalid if the module is uninitialized. If a new display mode is set, the existing Surface will automatically switch to operate on the new display.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了显示器Surface,这个模块的功能就会影响到现有的单个显示器。如果该模块未被初始化,Surface就会失效。如果设置了新的显示模式,现有的Surface将自动切换到新的显示器上操作。

trans-unit.source: One of: empty, low, medium, full, wired, max, or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 一： empty ， low ， medium ， full ， wired ， max ，或 unknown 。

trans-unit.source: Only scalable (outline) fonts can be rotated. An attempt to change the rotation of a bitmap font raises an AttributeError. An attempt to change the rotation of an inactive font instance, as returned by Font.__new__(), raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 只能旋转可缩放（轮廓）字体。尝试更改位图字体的旋转会引发AttributeError。尝试更改由 Font.__new__() 返回的不活动字体实例的旋转会引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: Opens the camera device, attempts to initialize it, and begins recording images to a buffer. The camera must be started before any of the below functions can be used.
trans-unit.target: 打开摄像机设备,尝试初始化它,并开始记录图像到缓冲区。在使用以下任何功能之前,必须先启动摄像机。

trans-unit.source: Optimization: if you know that the final destination for the text (on the screen) will always have a solid background, and the text is antialiased, you can improve performance by specifying the background color. This will cause the resulting image to maintain transparency information by colorkey rather than (much less efficient) alpha values.
trans-unit.target: 优化:如果你知道文本的最终目的地(在屏幕上)总是有一个纯背景,而且文本是反锯齿的,你可以通过指定背景色来提高性能。这将导致生成的图像通过colorkey而不是(效率低得多的)alpha值来保持透明度信息。

trans-unit.source: Optional fgcolor, style, rotation, and size arguments override the default values set for the Font instance.
trans-unit.target: 可选的fgcolor，style，rotation和size参数将覆盖为 Font 实例设置的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Optional data fields: write([[[0xc0, 0, 0], 20000]]) is equivalent to write([[[0xc0], 20000]])
trans-unit.target: 可选数据字段： write([[[0xc0, 0, 0], 20000]]) 等同于 write([[[0xc0], 20000]])

trans-unit.source: Optional keyword arguments:
trans-unit.target: 可选关键词参数。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, text can be None, which will render the text passed to a previous get_rect(), render(), render_to(), render_raw(), or render_raw_to() call. See render_to() for details.
trans-unit.target: 可选地，文本可以是 None ，它将呈现传递到先前的 get_rect() ， render() ， render_to() ， render_raw() 或 render_raw_to() 调用的文本。有关详细信息，请参见 render_to() 。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, text can be None, which will return the bounding rectangle for the text passed to a previous get_rect(), render(), render_to(), render_raw(), or render_raw_to() call. See render_to() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 可选地，文本可以是 None ，它将返回传递给先前的 get_rect() ， render() ， render_to() ， render_raw() 或 render_raw_to() 调用的文本的边界矩形。有关更多详细信息，请参见 render_to() 。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, text can be set None, which will re-render text passed to a previous render_to(), get_rect(), render(), render_raw(), or render_raw_to() call. Primarily, this feature is an aid to using render_to() in combination with get_rect(). An example:
trans-unit.target: （可选）可以将文本设置为 None ，它将重新渲染传递到先前的 render_to() ， get_rect() ， render() ， render_raw() 或 render_raw_to() 调用的文本。首先，此功能有助于将 render_to() 与 get_rect() 结合使用。一个例子：

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a size argument may be specified to set the default size in points, which determines the size of the rendered characters. The size can also be passed explicitly to each method call. Because of the way the caching system works, specifying a default size on the constructor doesn't imply a performance gain over manually passing the size on each function call. If the font is bitmap and no size is given, the default size is set to the first available size for the font.
trans-unit.target: 可选地，可以指定大小参数以设置默认大小（以磅为单位），该大小确定渲染字符的大小。大小也可以显式传递给每个方法调用。由于缓存系统的工作方式，在构造函数上指定默认大小并不意味着相对于在每个函数调用中手动传递大小要获得性能上的提高。如果字体是位图并且没有给出大小，则默认大小将设置为该字体的第一个可用大小。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you may specify a default cache_size for the Glyph cache: the maximum number of glyphs that will be cached at any given time by the module. Exceedingly small values will be automatically tuned for performance. Also a default pixel resolution, in dots per inch, can be given to adjust font scaling.
trans-unit.target: （可选）您可以为字形缓存指定默认的cache_size：模块在任何给定时间将要缓存的字形的最大数量。极小的值将自动调整以提高性能。还可以提供默认像素分辨率（以每英寸点数为单位）来调整字体缩放。

trans-unit.source: Or to preserve users ability to override the variable:
trans-unit.target: 或者保留用户覆盖变量的能力。

trans-unit.source: OrderedUpdates(*spites) -> OrderedUpdates
trans-unit.target: OrderedUpdates(*spites) -> OrderedUpdates

trans-unit.source: Other file formats are unsupported. Newer versions of SDL_mixer have better positioning support than earlier ones. An SDLError is raised if a particular format does not support positioning.

trans-unit.source: Pygame
trans-unit.target: Pygame

trans-unit.source: Pygame 2 has the following additional flags available.
trans-unit.target: Pygame 2有以下附加标志。

trans-unit.source: Pygame can only have a single display active at any time. Creating a new one with pygame.display.set_mode() will close the previous display. If precise control is needed over the pixel format or display resolutions, use the functions pygame.display.mode_ok(), pygame.display.list_modes(), and pygame.display.Info() to query information about the display.
trans-unit.target: Pygame在任何时候都只能激活一个显示器。使用 pygame.display.set_mode() 创建一个新显示器将关闭前一个显示器。如果需要精确控制像素格式或显示分辨率，请使用函数 pygame.display.mode_ok() ， pygame.display.list_modes() 和 pygame.display.Info() 来查询有关显示器的信息。

trans-unit.source: Pygame chooses one of many available display backends when it is initialized. This returns the internal name used for the display backend. This can be used to provide limited information about what display capabilities might be accelerated. See the SDL_VIDEODRIVER flags in pygame.display.set_mode() to see some of the common options.
trans-unit.target: Pygame在初始化时会从众多可用的显示后端中选择一个。这将返回用于显示后端的内部名称。这可以用于提供有关可以加速哪些显示功能的有限信息。请参阅 pygame.display.set_mode() 中的 SDL_VIDEODRIVER 标志以查看一些常用选项。

trans-unit.source: Pygame comes with a built-in default font. This can always be accessed by passing None as the font name to the Font constructor.
trans-unit.target: Pygame带有内置的默认字体。始终可以通过将None作为字体名称传递给 Font 构造函数来访问它。

trans-unit.source: Pygame comes with a builtin default font. This can always be accessed by passing None as the font name.
trans-unit.target: Pygame有一个内置的默认字体。可以通过传递None作为字体名来访问。

trans-unit.source: Pygame currently supports only Linux and v4l2 cameras.
trans-unit.target: Pygame目前只支持Linux和v4l2摄像机。

trans-unit.source: Pygame handles all its event messaging through an event queue. The routines in this module help you manage that event queue. The input queue is heavily dependent on the pygame.display module. If the display has not been initialized and a video mode not set, the event queue may not work properly. The event subsystem should be called from the main thread. If you want to post events into the queue from other threads, please use the pygame.fastevent module.
trans-unit.target: Pygame通过事件队列处理所有事件消息。该模块中的例程可帮助您管理该事件队列。输入队列在很大程度上取决于 pygame.display 模块。如果尚未初始化显示并且未设置视频模式，则事件队列可能无法正常工作。事件子系统应该从主线程中调用。如果要从其他线程将事件发布到队列中，请使用 pygame.fastevent 模块。

trans-unit.source: Pygame handles all its event messaging through an event queue. The routines in this module help you manage that event queue. The input queue is heavily dependent on the pygame.display module. If the display has not been initialized and a video mode not set, the event queue may not work properly. The event subsystem should be called from the main thread. If you want to post events into the queue from other threads, please use the pygame.fastevent module.
trans-unit.target: Pygame通过事件队列处理所有事件消息。此模块中的例程可帮助您管理该事件队列。输入队列在很大程度上取决于 pygame.display 模块。如果尚未初始化显示并且未设置视频模式，则事件队列可能无法正常工作。事件子系统应从主线程调用。如果要从其他线程将事件发布到队列中，请使用 pygame.fastevent 模块。

trans-unit.source: Pygame may not always be built to support all image formats. At minimum it will support uncompressed BMP. If pygame.image.get_extended() returns 'True', you should be able to load most images (including PNG, JPG and GIF).
trans-unit.target: Pygame可能并不总是构建为支持所有图像格式。至少它将支持未压缩的 BMP 。如果 pygame.image.get_extended() 返回“ True”，则您应该能够加载大多数图像（包括PNG，JPG和GIF）。

trans-unit.source: Pygame module for interacting with joysticks, gamepads, and trackballs.
trans-unit.target: Pygame模块,用于与操纵杆、游戏板和轨迹球互动。

trans-unit.source: Pygame offers control over the system hardware cursor. Pygame only supports black and white cursors for the system. You control the cursor with functions inside pygame.mouse.
trans-unit.target: Pygame提供了对系统硬件光标的控制。Pygame仅支持该系统的黑白光标。您可以使用 pygame.mouse 中的函数控制光标。

trans-unit.source: Pygame unit test suite package
trans-unit.target: Pygame单元测试套件包

trans-unit.source: Pygame uses Rect objects to store and manipulate rectangular areas. A Rect can be created from a combination of left, top, width, and height values. Rects can also be created from python objects that are already a Rect or have an attribute named "rect".
trans-unit.target: Pygame 使用 Rect 对象来存储和操作矩形区域。一个Rect可以由左、顶、宽、高的组合来创建,也可以由已经是Rect的python对象或有 "rect "属性的对象来创建。矩形也可以由已经是矩形或有 "rect "属性的python对象创建。

trans-unit.source: Pygame will automatically determine the image type (e.g., GIF or bitmap) and create a new Surface object from the data. In some cases it will need to know the file extension (e.g., GIF images should end in ".gif"). If you pass a raw file-like object, you may also want to pass the original filename as the namehint argument.
trans-unit.target: Pygame将自动确定图像类型（例如， GIF 或位图），并根据数据创建一个新的Surface对象。在某些情况下，它将需要知道文件扩展名（例如， GIF 图像应以“ .gif”结尾）。如果传递类似原始文件的对象，则可能还需要传递原始文件名作为namehint参数。

trans-unit.source: Pygame will select from one of several internal display backends when it is initialized. The display mode will be chosen depending on the platform and permissions of current user. Before the display module is initialized the environment variable SDL_VIDEODRIVER can be set to control which backend is used. The systems with multiple choices are listed here.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，Pygame将从多个内部显示后端之一中进行选择。将根据当前用户的平台和权限来选择显示模式。在初始化显示模块之前，可以将环境变量 SDL_VIDEODRIVER 设置为控制使用哪个后端。此处列出了具有多种选择的系统。

trans-unit.source: Regarding float values for coordinates, a point with coordinate consisting of two whole numbers is considered being right in the center of said pixel (and having a height and width of 1 pixel would therefore completely cover it), while a point with coordinate where one (or both) of the numbers have non-zero decimal parts would be partially covering two (or four if both numbers have decimal parts) adjacent pixels, e.g. the point (1.4, 2) covers 60% of the pixel (1, 2) and 40% of the pixel (2,2).
trans-unit.target: 关于坐标的浮点值，具有两个整数的坐标的点被认为恰好位于所述像素的中心（因此，高度和宽度为1像素将完全覆盖它），而具有坐标的点则为一个（或两个号码）具有非零的小数部分会被部分地覆盖两个（或四个如果两个数字有小数部分）相邻的像素，例如点 (1.4, 2) 覆盖的像素的60％ (1, 2) 和像素 (2,2) 的40％。

trans-unit.source: Remove any number of Sprites from the Group. This will only remove Sprites that are already members of the Group.

trans-unit.source: Removes all Sprites from this Group.
trans-unit.target: 从该组中删除所有的Sprites。

trans-unit.source: Removes all events from the queue. If eventtype is given, removes the given event or sequence of events. This has the same effect as pygame.event.get() except None is returned. It can be slightly more efficient when clearing a full event queue.
trans-unit.target: 从队列中删除所有事件。如果 eventtype ，则删除指定的事件或事件序列。除了返回 None 之外，这与 pygame.event.get() 具有相同的效果。清除完整的事件队列时，它的效率可能会更高。

trans-unit.source: Render to an array object exposing an array struct interface. The array must be two dimensional with integer items. The default dest value, None, is equivalent to position (0, 0). See render_to(). As with the other render methods, text can be None to render a text string passed previously to another method.
trans-unit.target: 渲染到暴露数组结构接口的数组对象。该数组必须是带有整数项的二维数组。默认DEST值， None ，相当于位置（0，0）。参见 render_to() 。与其他渲染方法一样，text可以为 None 以渲染先前传递给另一个方法的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: RenderUpdates sub-class that draws Sprites in order of addition.
trans-unit.target: RenderUpdates子类,按加法顺序绘制Sprites。

trans-unit.source: RenderUpdates(*sprites) -> RenderUpdates
trans-unit.target: RenderUpdates(*sprites) -> RenderUpdates

trans-unit.source: Renders the string text to the pygame.Surfacesurf, at position dest, a (x, y) surface coordinate pair. If either x or y is not an integer it is converted to one if possible. Any sequence where the first two items are x and y positional elements is accepted, including a Rect instance. As with render(), optional fgcolor, style, rotation, and size argument are available.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串文本渲染到 pygame.Surface surf，在位置dest处，是一个（x，y）表面坐标对。如果x或y不是整数，则在可能的情况下将其转换为1。可以接受前两个元素分别是x和y位置元素的任何序列，包括 Rect 实例。与 render() 一样，可选的fgcolor，style，rotation和size参数也可用。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the passed color in the PixelArray with another one.
trans-unit.target: 用另一种颜色替换PixelArray中传递的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the pixels with the passed color in the PixelArray by changing them them to the passed replacement color.
trans-unit.target: 通过将像素数组中传递的颜色替换为传递的替换颜色来替换像素。

trans-unit.source: Request an OpenGL display attribute for the display mode
trans-unit.target: 为显示模式申请一个OpenGL显示属性。

trans-unit.source: Request the window for the display surface be iconified or hidden. Not all systems and displays support an iconified display. The function will return True if successful.
trans-unit.target: 要求将显示面的窗口图标化或隐藏。并非所有系统和显示器都支持图标化显示。如果成功,该函数将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Reserves a pygame.USEREVENT for a custom use.
trans-unit.target: 保留 pygame.USEREVENT 供自定义使用。

trans-unit.source: Resets playback of the current music to the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 将当前音乐的播放重设为开头。

trans-unit.source: Resizes a mask
trans-unit.target: 调整掩模大小

trans-unit.source: Resizes the Surface to a new resolution. This is a fast scale operation that does not sample the results.
trans-unit.target: 将曲面调整为新的分辨率。这是一个不对结果进行采样的快速缩放操作。

trans-unit.source: Resources such as images and sounds for the examples are found in the pygame/examples/data subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 例子的图片和声音等资源可以在pygame/examples/data子目录下找到。

trans-unit.source: Resume the playback on a paused channel.
trans-unit.target: 在暂停的通道上恢复播放。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data for the specified type from the clipboard. In python 3 the data is returned as a byte string and might need further processing (such as decoding to Unicode).
trans-unit.target: 从剪贴板中获取指定类型的数据。在python 3中,数据以字节串的形式返回,可能需要进一步的处理(如解码为Unicode)。

trans-unit.source: Return False if there is a cdrom currently in the drive. If the drive is empty this will return True.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前硬盘中有CDROM,则返回False。如果驱动器是空的,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True if the Group contains all of the given sprites. This is similar to using the "in" operator on the Group ("if sprite in group: ..."), which tests if a single Sprite belongs to a Group.
trans-unit.target: 如果Group包含所有给定的Sprite,返回True。这类似于在Group上使用 "in "操作符("if sprite in group:..."),测试单个Sprite是否属于一个Group。

trans-unit.source: Return True if the Joystick object is currently initialised.
trans-unit.target: 如果Joystick对象当前处于初始化状态,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font bold rendering mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体粗体渲染模式时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font italic rendering mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体斜体渲染模式时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font underline is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体下划线时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return a Channel object for one of the current channels. The id must be a value from 0 to the value of pygame.mixer.get_num_channels().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前通道之一的Channel对象。id必须是从0到 pygame.mixer.get_num_channels() 的值。

trans-unit.source: Return a buffer object for the pixels of the Surface. The buffer can be used for direct pixel access and manipulation. Surface pixel data is represented as an unstructured block of memory, with a start address and length in bytes. The data need not be contiguous. Any gaps are included in the length, but otherwise ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface像素的缓冲区对象。缓冲区可以用来直接访问和操作像素。Surface像素数据是以一个非结构化的内存块来表示的,其起始地址和长度以字节为单位。数据不需要是连续的。任何空隙都包含在长度中,但在其他方面可以忽略。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the RGBA Color value at the given pixel. If the Surface has no per pixel alpha, then the alpha value will always be 255 (opaque). If the pixel position is outside the area of the Surface an IndexError exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定像素的 RGBA 颜色值的副本。如果Surface没有每个像素的Alpha，则Alpha值将始终为255（不透明）。如果像素位置在Surface区域之外，则会引发 IndexError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the Sound object buffer as a bytes (for Python 3.x) or str (for Python 2.x) object.
trans-unit.target: 返回声音对象缓冲区的一个字节(对于Python 3.x)或str(对于Python 2.x)对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Return a description of the last error which occurred in the FreeType2 library, or None if no errors have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回在FreeType2库中发生的最后一个错误的描述，如果没有发生错误，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Return a description of the last error which occurred in the FreeType2 library, or None if no errors have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回在FreeType2库中发生的最后一个错误的描述,如果没有错误发生,则返回None。

trans-unit.target: 返回对 touchid 上活动的手指 index 字典。该字典包含以下键：

trans-unit.source: Return a floating point value in seconds of the length of the cdrom track.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM轨道长度的浮点数,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Return a list containing all Sprites in a Group that intersect with another Sprite. Intersection is determined by comparing the Sprite.rect attribute of each Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含一个组中与另一个Sprite相交的所有Sprite。交叉点是通过比较每个Sprite 的 Sprite.rect 属性确定的。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all the Groups that contain this Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含该Sprite的所有Group的列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all the Sprites this group contains. You can also get an iterator from the group, but you cannot iterate over a Group while modifying it.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个组包含的所有Sprites的列表。你也可以从该组中获得一个迭代器,但你不能在修改组时对其进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all the Sprites this group contains. You can also get an iterator from the group, but you cannot iterator over a Group while modifying it.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个组包含的所有Sprites的列表。你也可以从该组中获取迭代器,但你不能在修改组时对其进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of up to 256 color elements that represent the indexed colors used in an 8-bit Surface. The returned list is a copy of the palette, and changes will have no effect on the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回最多256个颜色元素的列表,这些颜色元素代表8位Surface中使用的索引颜色。返回的列表是调色板的副本,更改后不会对Surface产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Return a list with information for every track on the cdrom. The information consists of a tuple with four values. The audio value is True if the track contains audio data. The start, end, and length values are floating point numbers in seconds. Start and end represent absolute times on the entire disc.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM中每条轨道的信息列表。这些信息由一个包含四个值的元组组成。如果该轨道包含音频数据,则音频值为True。start、end和length值是以秒为单位的浮点数。开始和结束代表整个光盘的绝对时间。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. If a suitable system font is not found, a default, Pygame, is returned instead. The font name can be a comma separated list of font names to search for.
trans-unit.target: 返回从系统字体加载的新Font对象。字体将与请求的粗体和斜体标志匹配。如果找不到合适的系统字体，则返回默认值Pygame。字体名称可以是要搜索的以逗号分隔的字体名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. Pygame uses a small set of common font aliases. If the specific font you ask for is not available, a reasonable alternative may be used. If a suitable system font is not found this will fall back on loading the default pygame font.
trans-unit.target: 返回从系统字体加载的新Font对象。字体将与请求的粗体和斜体标志匹配。Pygame使用少量的常用字体别名。如果您要求的特定字体不可用，则可以使用合理的替代方法。如果找不到合适的系统字体，将在加载默认pygame字体时退回。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. If a suitable system font is not found this will fall back on loading the default pygame font. The font name can be a comma separated list of font names to look for.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从系统字体中加载的新字体对象。字体将与要求的粗体和斜体标志相匹配。如果没有找到合适的系统字体,将返回加载默认的pygame字体。字体名称可以是一个逗号分隔的字体名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. Pygame uses a small set of common font aliases. If the specific font you ask for is not available, a reasonable alternative may be used. If a suitable system font is not found this will fall back on loading the default pygame font.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从系统字体中加载的新字体对象。字体将与要求的粗体和斜体标志相匹配。Pygame使用了一小部分常用的字体别名。如果您要求的特定字体不可用,可以使用一个合理的替代字体。如果没有找到合适的系统字体,就会回到加载默认的pygame字体。

trans-unit.source: Return a rectangle of the current clipping area. The Surface will always return a valid rectangle that will never be outside the bounds of the image. If the Surface has had None set for the clipping area, the Surface will return a rectangle with the full area of the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前剪切区域的矩形。Surface将始终返回一个永远不会超出图像范围的有效矩形。如果为Surface 的修剪区域设置了“ None ，则Surface将返回一个矩形，其中包含Surface的整个区域。

trans-unit.source: Return a reference to the currently set display Surface. If no display mode has been set this will return None.
trans-unit.target: 返回对当前设置的显示模式Surface的引用。如果没有设置显示模式,则返回None。

trans-unit.source: Return a value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the volume for this Sound.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从0.0到1.0的值,代表这个声音的音量。

trans-unit.source: Return an integer id associated with the given index.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定 index 关联的整数id 。

trans-unit.source: Return an object which exports a surface's internal pixel buffer as a C level array struct, Python level array interface or a C level buffer interface. The pixel buffer is writeable. The new buffer protocol is supported for Python 2.6 and up in CPython. The old buffer protocol is also supported for Python 2.x. The old buffer data is in one segment for kind '0', multi-segment for other buffer view kinds.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象,该对象将曲面的内部像素缓冲区输出为 C 级数组结构、Python 级数组接口或 C 级缓冲区接口。像素缓冲区是可写的。新的缓冲区协议在CPython中支持Python 2.6及以上版本。旧的缓冲区协议也支持Python 2.x。旧的缓冲区数据对于'0'类是一段,对于其他缓冲区视图类是多段。

trans-unit.source: Return rendered text as a string of bytes
trans-unit.target: 将渲染后的文本作为一串字节返回。

trans-unit.source: Return rendered text as a surface
trans-unit.target: 将渲染后的文本作为曲面返回

trans-unit.source: Return the FreeType version
trans-unit.target: 返回FreeType版本

trans-unit.source: Return the absolute time in seconds where at start of the cdrom track.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM轨道开始时的绝对时间(秒)。

trans-unit.source: Return the actual Sound object currently playing on this channel. If the channel is idle None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前在此通道上播放的实际Sound对象。如果通道空闲， None 返回任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Return the current alpha value for the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface的当前alpha值。

trans-unit.source: Return the current colorkey value for the Surface. If the colorkey is not set then None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface的当前colorkey值。如果未设置色键，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Return the default device ID or -1 if there are no devices. The result can be passed to the Input/Output class.
trans-unit.target: 返回默认设备ID；如果没有设备，则返回 -1 。结果可以传递到 Input / Output 类。

trans-unit.source: Return the default pixel size in dots per inch
trans-unit.target: 返回默认的像素大小,单位为每英寸点。

trans-unit.source: Return the filename of the default pygame font. This is not the full path to the file. The file is usually in the same directory as the font module, but can also be bundled in a separate archive.
trans-unit.target: 返回默认pygame字体的文件名。这不是文件的完整路径。该文件通常与字体模块在同一目录下,但也可以捆绑在一个单独的档案中。

trans-unit.source: Return the filename of the system font. This is not the full path to the file. This file can usually be found in the same directory as the font module, but it can also be bundled in separate archives.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统字体的文件名。这不是文件的完整路径。这个文件通常可以在字体模块的同一目录下找到,但也可以捆绑在单独的档案中。

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph bounding box height of the font in pixels. This is the average value of all glyphs in the font. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体的字形边界框高度,单位为像素。这是字体中所有字形的平均值。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph case size
trans-unit.target: 返回字形大小

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph metrics for the given text
trans-unit.target: 返回给定文本的字形度量。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for a line of text with the font. When rendering multiple lines of text this is the recommended amount of space between lines.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有字体的一行文字的高度,单位为像素。当渲染多行文字时,建议在行与行之间留出一定的空间。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for the font ascent. The ascent is the number of pixels from the font baseline to the top of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体上升的高度,单位为像素。上升高度是指从字体基线到字体顶部的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for the font descent. The descent is the number of pixels from the font baseline to the bottom of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体下降的高度,单位为像素。下降高度是指从字体基线到字体底部的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels of the actual rendered text. This is the average size for each glyph in the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回实际渲染文本的高度,单位为像素。这是字体中每个字形的平均大小。

trans-unit.source: Return the height of the Surface in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回曲面的高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer value of the given pixel. If the pixel position is outside the area of the Surface an IndexError exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定像素的整数值。如果像素位置在Surface区域之外，则会引发 IndexError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Return the latest FreeType error
trans-unit.target: 返回最新的FreeType错误

trans-unit.source: Return the least significant number of bits stripped from each color in a mapped integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回映射整数中每个颜色的最小有效位数。

trans-unit.source: Return the length of this Sound in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回此声音的长度,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of active channels this sound is playing on.
trans-unit.target: 返回该声音正在播放的活动通道数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of available touch devices.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用触摸设备的数量。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of bytes separating each row in the Surface. Surfaces in video memory are not always linearly packed. Subsurfaces will also have a larger pitch than their real width.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface中每行之间的字节数。视频存储器中的曲面并不总是线性填充的。子表面的间距也会比实际宽度大。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of bytes used per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个像素使用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of cd drives on the system. When you create CD objects you need to pass an integer id that must be lower than this count. The count will be 0 if there are no drives on the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统上CD驱动器的数量。创建 CD 对象时，您需要传递一个整数ID，该ID必须小于此计数。如果系统上没有驱动器，则计数为0。

trans-unit.target: 返回id为_的触摸设备的活动手指数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of joystick devices on the system. The count will be 0 if there are no joysticks on the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统上操纵杆设备的数量。如果系统上没有操纵杆，则计数为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of milliseconds since pygame.init() was called. Before pygame is initialized this will always be 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回自调用 pygame.init() 以来的毫秒数。在初始化pygame之前，该值始终为0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of pixels from the font's baseline to the top of the bounding box. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回从字体基线到边界框顶部的像素数。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of tracks on the cdrom in the drive. This will return zero of the drive is empty or has no tracks.
trans-unit.target: 返回驱动器中CDROM上的轨道数,如果驱动器为空或没有轨道,则返回0。如果硬盘是空的或者没有轨道,则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of units from the font's baseline to the top of the bounding box. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回从字体基线到边界框顶部的单位数。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the size and offset of rendered text
trans-unit.target: 返回已渲染文本的大小和偏移量

trans-unit.source: Return the size of the window or screen
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口或屏幕的大小

trans-unit.source: Return the string name of the drive. This is the system name used to represent the drive. It is often the drive letter or device name. This method can work on an uninitialized CD.
trans-unit.target: 返回驱动器的字符串名称。这是用于表示驱动器的系统名称。通常是驱动器号或设备名称。此方法可以在未初始化的 CD 上工作。

trans-unit.source: Return the volume of the channel for the current playing sound. This does not take into account stereo separation used by Channel.set_volume(). The Sound object also has its own volume which is mixed with the channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前播放声音的声道音量。这没有考虑 Channel.set_volume() 使用的立体声分离。声音对象也有自己的音量，与通道混合。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the Surface is required to be locked to access pixel data. Usually pure software Surfaces do not require locking. This method is rarely needed, since it is safe and quickest to just lock all Surfaces as needed.

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the channel is actively mixing sound. If the channel is idle this returns False.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道正在积极混合声音，则返回 True 。如果通道空闲，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the given event type is blocked from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定事件类型被从队列中阻止，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the given event type is blocked from the queue. If a sequence of event types is passed, this will return True if any of those event types are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定事件类型被从队列中阻止，则返回 True 。如果传递了一系列事件类型，则如果这些事件类型中的任何一个被阻止，则将返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the mixer is busy mixing any channels. If the mixer is idle then this return False.
trans-unit.target: 如果混音器正在忙于混合任何通道，则返回 True 。如果混音器空闲，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if there are any events of the given type waiting on the queue. If a sequence of event types is passed, this will return True if any of those events are on the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果队列中有任何给定类型的事件等待，则返回 True 。如果传递了一系列事件类型，则如果这些事件中的任何一个在队列中，则它将返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the Surface is locked. It doesn't matter how many times the Surface is locked.
trans-unit.target: Surface锁定时返回 True 。Surface锁定多少次都没有关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the display window has keyboard focus from the system. If the display needs to ensure it does not lose keyboard focus, it can use pygame.event.set_grab() to grab all input.
trans-unit.target: 当显示窗口具有系统的键盘焦点时，返回 True 。如果显示需要确保它不会失去键盘焦点，则可以使用 pygame.event.set_grab() 获取所有输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the input events are grabbed for this application.
trans-unit.target: 当为此应用程序获取输入事件时，返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the pygame.display module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pygame.display 模块当前已初始化，则返回True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the init() method has already been called on this Joystick object.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经在此Joystick对象上调用了 init() 方法，则返回True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the FreeType module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果FreeType模块当前被初始化,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the display module has been initialized
trans-unit.target: 如果显示模块已被初始化,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the drive busy playing back audio.
trans-unit.target: 如果硬盘忙于播放音频,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the drive is currently paused.
trans-unit.target: 如果硬盘当前处于暂停状态,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the joystick module is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果操纵杆模块被初始化,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the pygame.fastevent module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前pygame.fastevent模块被初始化,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the scrap module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前废品回收模块被初始化,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the vector has length equal to 1. Otherwise it returns False.
trans-unit.target: 如果向量的 length 等于 1 ,则返回True 。否则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the vector has length == 1. Otherwise it returns False.
trans-unit.target: 如果向量的长度==1,则返回True。否则返回False。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the Sprite belongs to one or more Groups.
trans-unit.target: 当Sprite属于一个或多个Group时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the display Surface is considered actively renderable on the screen and may be visible to the user. This is the default state immediately after pygame.display.set_mode(). This method may return True even if the application is fully hidden behind another application window.
trans-unit.target: 当认为显示Surface在屏幕上可主动渲染并且用户可见时，返回True。这是 pygame.display.set_mode() 之后的默认状态。即使应用程序完全隐藏在另一个应用程序窗口的后面，此方法也可能返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the display is active on the display
trans-unit.target: 当显示器上的显示处于活动状态时,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the display is active on the screen
trans-unit.target: 当屏幕上的显示处于活动状态时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the music stream is actively playing. When the music is idle this returns False.
trans-unit.target: 当音乐流在主动播放时,返回True。当音乐处于空闲状态时,返回False。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the music stream is actively playing. When the music is idle this returns False. In pygame 2.0.1 and above this function returns False when the music is paused. In pygame 1 it returns True when the music is paused.
trans-unit.target: 当音乐流在主动播放时,返回True。当音乐处于空闲状态时,返回False。在 pygame 2.0.1 及以上版本中,当音乐暂停时,该函数返回 False。在 pygame 1 中,当音乐暂停时返回 True。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Mask, the same size as this mask, containing the overlapping set bits between this mask and othermask.
trans-unit.target: 返回与该掩码大小相同的 Mask ，其中包含此mask与 othermask 之间的重叠设置位。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Rect instance containing the width and height of the text's bounding box and the position of the text's origin. The origin is useful in aligning separately rendered pieces of text. It gives the baseline position and bearing at the start of the text. See the render_to() method for an example.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 Rect 实例，其中包含文本边界框的宽度和高度以及文本原点的位置。原点在对齐单独渲染的文本片段时很有用。它在文本的开头给出了基线位置和方位。有关示例，请参见 render_to() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Color which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Color in RGBA space. The second parameter determines how far between self and other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Returns a Color which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Color in RGBA space.第二个参数决定self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Rect based on the size of the mask
trans-unit.target: 根据掩码的大小返回一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns a True value when the Overlay is hardware accelerated. If the platform does not support acceleration, software rendering is used.
trans-unit.target: 当Overlay被硬件加速时,返回一个True值,如果平台不支持加速,则使用软件渲染。如果平台不支持加速,则使用软件渲染。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self an other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self an 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector,它是self和给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数决定了self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self an other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1, where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector，它是self与给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数确定结果之间的距离。它必须是介于 0 和 1 之间的值，其中 0 表示self，而 1 表示other将被返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self and other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector,它是self和给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数决定self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self and other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector，它是self与给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数确定自我与他人之间的结果之间的距离。它必须是介于 0 和 1 之间的值，其中 0 表示self， 1 表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the fonts available on the system. The names of the fonts will be set to lowercase with all spaces and punctuation removed. This works on most systems, but some will return an empty list if they cannot find fonts.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中所有可用字体的列表。字体名称将被设置为小写,并去除所有空格和标点符号。这对大多数系统都有效,但有些系统如果找不到字体,会返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the indices that contain rectangles that collide with the Rect. If no intersecting rectangles are found, an empty list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有包含与矩形相交的矩形的索引列表。如果没有找到相交的矩形,返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the key and value pairs that intersect with the calling Rect object. If no collisions are found an empty list is returned. If use_values is 0 (default) then the dict's keys will be used in the collision detection, otherwise the dict's values will be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用Rect对象相交的所有键和值对的列表。如果未找到冲突，则返回一个空列表。如果 use_values 为0（默认值），则在冲突检测中将使用字典的键，否则将使用字典的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of bounding rects of connected components
trans-unit.target: 返回连接组件的边界矩形列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of masks of connected components
trans-unit.target: 返回连接组件的掩码列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of points of the outline of the first connected component encountered in the mask. To find a connected component, the mask is searched per row (left to right) starting in the top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 返回掩模中遇到的第一个连接组件的轮廓点的列表。从左上角开始按行(从左到右)搜索蒙板,以找到一个连接的元件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of points outlining an object
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象的点的列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuple records, one for each point size supported. Each tuple containing the point size, the height in pixels, width in pixels, horizontal ppem (nominal width) in fractional pixels, and vertical ppem (nominal height) in fractional pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组记录的列表,每个支持的点尺寸都有一个元组。每个元组包含点的大小,高度(像素),宽度(像素),水平ppem(标称宽度)(小数像素),垂直ppem(标称高度)(小数像素)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a mask containing a connected component
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含连接组件的掩码

trans-unit.source: Returns a mask of the overlapping set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回重叠集位的掩码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new pygame.Rect() object based on the size of this mask. The rect's default position will be (0, 0) and its default width and height will be the same as this mask's. The rect's attributes can be altered via pygame.Rect() attribute keyword arguments/values passed into this method. As an example, a_mask.get_rect(center=(10, 5)) would create a pygame.Rect() based on the mask's size centered at the given position.
trans-unit.target: 根据此蒙版的大小返回一个新的 pygame.Rect() 对象。 rect的默认位置将为 (0, 0) ，其默认宽度和高度将与该蒙版的相同。可以通过传递给此方法的 pygame.Rect() 属性关键字参数/值来更改rect的属性。例如， a_mask.get_rect(center=(10, 5)) 将基于以给定位置为中心的蒙版大小创建 pygame.Rect() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Surface, with the text rendered to it in the color given by 'fgcolor'. If no foreground color is given, the default foreground color, fgcolor is used. If bgcolor is given, the surface will be filled with this color. When no background color is given, the surface background is transparent, zero alpha. Normally the returned surface has a 32 bit pixel size. However, if bgcolor is None and anti-aliasing is disabled a monochrome 8 bit colorkey surface, with colorkey set for the background color, is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 Surface ，文本以'fgcolor'给定的颜色呈现给它。如果未提供前景色，则使用默认前景色 fgcolor 。如果指定了 bgcolor ，则表面将填充该颜色。如果未提供背景颜色，则表面背景是透明的，零alpha。通常，返回的表面具有32位像素大小。但是，如果 bgcolor 为 None 且禁用了抗锯齿功能，则返回单色的8位colorkey曲面，其中colorkey设置为背景色。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Color where each of the red, green and blue colour channels have been multiplied by the alpha channel of the original color. The alpha channel remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的颜色,其中红、绿、蓝三个颜色通道都乘以原始颜色的alpha通道。阿尔法通道保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Surface that shares its pixels with its new parent. The new Surface is considered a child of the original. Modifications to either Surface pixels will effect each other. Surface information like clipping area and color keys are unique to each Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Surface,它与新的父节点共享像素。新的Surface被认为是原Surface的子代。对任何一个Surface像素的修改都会互相影响。每个Surface的剪裁区域和颜色键等Surface信息都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new copy of the mask
trans-unit.target: 返回面具的新副本

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle covering the entire surface. This rectangle will always start at (0, 0) with a width and height the same size as the image.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个覆盖整个表面的新矩形。这个矩形总是以(0,0)为起点,宽度和高度与图像大小相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle having the same position and size as the original.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,其位置和大小与原矩形相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that completely covers the area of the two provided rectangles. There may be area inside the new Rect that is not covered by the originals.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,它完全覆盖了两个提供的矩形的面积。在新的矩形中,可能有一些区域没有被原矩形覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is cropped to be completely inside the argument Rect. If the two rectangles do not overlap to begin with, a Rect with 0 size is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,该矩形被裁剪成完全位于参数Rect内。如果两个矩形没有重叠,则返回一个尺寸为0的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved and resized to fit another. The aspect ratio of the original Rect is preserved, so the new rectangle may be smaller than the target in either width or height.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,该矩形被移动并调整大小以适应另一个矩形。保留原矩形的长宽比,因此新矩形的宽度或高度可能比目标小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved by the given offset. The x and y arguments can be any integer value, positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个按给定偏移量移动的新矩形。x和y参数可以是任何整数,正或负。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved to be completely inside the argument Rect. If the rectangle is too large to fit inside, it is centered inside the argument Rect, but its size is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,这个矩形被移动到参数Rect的内部。如果矩形太大,无法放入,则以参数Rect为中心,但其大小不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle with the size changed by the given offset. The rectangle remains centered around its current center. Negative values will shrink the rectangle. Note, uses integers, if the offset given is too small(< 2 > -2), center will be off.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形，其大小根据给定的偏移量进行了更改。矩形保持其当前中心为中心。负值将缩小矩形。注意，使用整数，如果给定的偏移量太小（<2> -2），则中心将关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new vector that has length equal to 1 and the same direction as self.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的向量，该向量的 length 等于 1 ，并且与self的方向相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new vector that has length == 1 and the same direction as self.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的向量,其长度==1,方向与self相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new vector that points in the direction as if self would bounce of a surface characterized by the given surface normal. The length of the new vector is the same as self's.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的向量,其指向的方向就像self在给定表面法线的表面上弹跳一样。新向量的长度与self的长度相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of boolean values representing the state of every key on the keyboard. Use the key constant values to index the array. A True value means the that button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值序列，该布尔值表示键盘上每个键的状态。使用键常量值为数组建立索引。甲 True 值表示该按钮被按下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of boolean values representing the state of every key on the keyboard. Use the key constant values to index the array. A True value means the that button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表键盘上每个键的状态的布尔值序列。使用按键常量值来索引数组。True表示该键被按下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of booleans representing the state of all the mouse buttons. A true value means the mouse is currently being pressed at the time of the call.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表所有鼠标按钮状态的布尔值序列。一个true的值意味着在调用时鼠标正在被按下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of current Surface features. Each feature is a bit in the flags bitmask. Typical flags are HWSURFACE, RLEACCEL, SRCALPHA, and SRCCOLORKEY.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组当前的Surface特征。每个功能都是标志位掩码中的一个位。典型标志是 HWSURFACE ， RLEACCEL ， SRCALPHA 和 SRCCOLORKEY 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single event from the queue. If the event queue is empty an event of type pygame.NOEVENT will be returned immediately. The returned event is removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 从队列返回单个事件。如果事件队列为空，则将立即返回 pygame.NOEVENT 类型的事件。返回的事件将从队列中删除。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single event from the queue. If the queue is empty this function will wait until one is created. From pygame 2.0.0, if a timeout argument is given, the function will return an event of type pygame.NOEVENT if no events enter the queue in timeout milliseconds. The event is removed from the queue once it has been returned. While the program is waiting it will sleep in an idle state. This is important for programs that want to share the system with other applications.
trans-unit.target: 从队列返回单个事件。如果队列为空，此函数将等待直到创建一个。从pygame 2.0.0开始，如果给出了 timeout 参数，则该函数将返回 pygame.NOEVENT 类型的事件，如果没有事件以 timeout 毫秒为单位进入队列。返回事件后，该事件将从队列中删除。在程序等待时，它将以空闲状态进入睡眠状态。这对于想要与其他应用程序共享系统的程序很重要。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single event from the queue. If the queue is empty this function will wait until one is created. The event is removed from the queue once it has been returned. While the program is waiting it will sleep in an idle state. This is important for programs that want to share the system with other applications.
trans-unit.target: 从队列中返回一个事件。如果队列是空的,该函数将等待创建一个队列。一旦事件被返回,就会从队列中删除。当程序在等待时,它将以空闲状态睡眠。这对于想要与其他应用程序共享系统的程序来说很重要。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single integer representing a bitmask of all the modifier keys being held. Using bitwise operators you can test if specific modifier keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个单个整数，该整数表示所持有的所有修饰键的位掩码。使用按位运算符，您可以测试是否按下了特定的修饰键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single integer representing a bitmask of all the modifier keys being held. Using bitwise operators you can test if specific shift keys are pressed, the state of the capslock button, and more.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数,代表所有被按住的修改键的位掩码。使用位元运算符可以测试是否有特定的shift键被按下、capslock按钮的状态等。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing the name (in CapWords style) of the given event type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串,代表指定事件类型的名称(CapWords风格)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a surface with the mask drawn on it
trans-unit.target: 返回画有蒙版的曲面

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, phi) where r is the radial distance, and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组(r,phi),其中r是径向距离,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组(r,theta,phi),其中r是径向距离,theta是倾角,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, phi) where r is the radial distance, and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组 (r, phi) ，其中r是径向距离，phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组 (r, theta, phi) ，其中r是径向距离，theta是倾斜角度，phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕x轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但以弧度为单位绕x轴逆时针旋转的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕y轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但以弧度为单位绕y轴逆时针旋转的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕z轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同,但以弧度为单位绕z轴逆时针旋转的向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in degrees around the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与自身长度相同的向量,但围绕给定轴逆时针旋转给定角度的向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in degrees.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current event on the queue. If there are no messages waiting on the queue, this will not return until one is available. trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a joystick axis. The value will range from -1 to 1 with a value of 0 being centered. You may want to take into account some tolerance to handle jitter, and joystick drift may keep the joystick from centering at 0 or using the full range of position values.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆轴的当前位置。该值的范围为-1到1,0值为居中。你可能需要考虑一些公差来处理抖动,而操纵杆漂移可能会使操纵杆无法在0处居中或使用全部位置值范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a joystick axis. The value will range from -1 to 1 with a value of 0 being centered. You may want to take into account some tolerance to handle jitter, and joystick drift may keep the joystick from centering at 0 or using the full range of position values.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a position hat. The position is given as two values representing the X and Y position for the hat. (0, 0) means centered. trans-unit.target: 返回位置帽的当前位置。该位置由两个值表示，分别表示帽子的 X 和 Y 位置。（0，0）表示居中。值-1表示左/下，值1表示右/上：so（-1，0）表示左；（1，0）表示正确；（0，1）表示向上；（1，1）表示右上角；等等

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a position hat. The position is given as two values representing the x and y position for the hat. (0, 0) means centered. trans-unit.source: Scales the vector so that it has the given length. The direction of the vector is not changed. You can also scale to length 0. If the vector is the zero vector (i.e. has length 0 thus no direction) an ZeroDivisionError is raised.

The pygame.gfxdraw module differs from the pygame.draw module in the API it uses and the different draw functions available. pygame.gfxdraw wraps the primitives from the library called SDL_gfx, rather than using modified versions.

trans-unit.source: Select an instrument.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个仪器。

trans-unit.source: Set GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES to a value above 0 to control the amount of anti-aliasing. A typical value is 2 or 3.
trans-unit.target: 将 GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES 设置为大于0的值以控制抗锯齿的量。典型值为2或3。

trans-unit.source: Set an event type to appear on the event queue every given number of milliseconds. The first event will not appear until the amount of time has passed.
trans-unit.target: 设置事件类型,每给定的毫秒数出现在事件队列中。第一个事件将不会出现,直到时间量过后。

trans-unit.source: Set the RGBA or mapped integer color value for a single pixel. If the Surface does not have per pixel alphas, the alpha value is ignored. Setting pixels outside the Surface area or outside the Surface clipping will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 为单个像素设置 RGBA 或映射的整数颜色值。如果Surface没有每个像素的Alpha，则Alpha值将被忽略。将像素设置在“曲面”区域之外或“曲面”修剪之外。将无效。

trans-unit.source: Set the current alpha value for the Surface. When blitting this Surface onto a destination, the pixels will be drawn slightly transparent. The alpha value is an integer from 0 to 255, 0 is fully transparent and 255 is fully opaque. If None is passed for the alpha value, then alpha blending will be disabled, including per-pixel alpha.
trans-unit.target: 设置表面的当前Alpha值。将此Surface拖到目标上时，像素将被绘制为稍微透明。alpha值是0到255之间的整数，0是完全透明的，而255是完全不透明的。如果为Alpha值传递了 None ，则将禁用Alpha混合，包括每像素Alpha。

trans-unit.source: Set the current color key for the Surface. When blitting this Surface onto a destination, any pixels that have the same color as the colorkey will be transparent. The color can be an RGB color or a mapped color integer. If None is passed, the colorkey will be unset.
trans-unit.target: 设置表面的当前颜色键。将此Surface拖到目标上时，与colorkey颜色相同的任何像素都是透明的。颜色可以是 RGB 颜色或映射的颜色整数。如果 None ，则将取消设置色键。

trans-unit.source: Set the current mouse position to arguments given. If the mouse cursor is visible it will jump to the new coordinates. Moving the mouse will generate a new pygame.MOUSEMOTION event.
trans-unit.target: 将当前鼠标位置设置为给定的参数。如果鼠标光标可见，它将跳到新坐标。移动鼠标将生成一个新的 pygame.MOUSEMOTION 事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the current window caption
trans-unit.target: 设置当前窗口的标题

trans-unit.source: Set the default pixel size in dots per inch for the module
trans-unit.target: 设置模块的默认像素大小,以点/英寸为单位。

trans-unit.source: Set the default pixel size, in dots per inch, for the module. If the optional argument is omitted or zero the resolution is reset to 72 DPI.
trans-unit.target: 设置模块的默认像素大小,单位为dots per inch。如果可选参数被省略或为零,则分辨率被重置为72DPI。

trans-unit.source: Set the display color palette for indexed displays
trans-unit.target: 设置索引显示器的显示调色板。

trans-unit.source: Set the full palette for an 8-bit Surface. This will replace the colors in the existing palette. A partial palette can be passed and only the first colors in the original palette will be changed.
trans-unit.target: 为8位Surface设置完整的调色板。这将取代现有调色板中的颜色。可以传递部分调色板,只有原始调色板中的第一种颜色会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Set the location for the overlay. The overlay will always be shown relative to the main display Surface. This does not actually redraw the overlay, it will be updated on the next call to Overlay.display().
trans-unit.target: 设置叠加层的位置。覆盖层将始终相对于主显示表面显示。这实际上不会重绘叠加层，它将在下次调用 Overlay.display() 时进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Set the number of elements in the Color to 1,2,3, or 4.
trans-unit.target: 将颜色中的元素数量设置为1、2、3或4。

trans-unit.source: Set the palette value for a single entry in a Surface palette. The index should be a value from 0 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 设置Surface调色板中单个条目的调色值。指数应该是0到255的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma ramps with an explicit lookup table. Each argument should be sequence of 256 integers. The integers should range between 0 and 0xffff. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 用一个显式查找表设置红、绿、蓝伽马斜坡。每个参数应该是256个整数的序列。整数的范围应该在0到0xffff之间。并非所有系统和硬件都支持伽马斜坡,如果函数成功,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma ramps with an explicit lookup table. Each argument should be sequence of 256 integers. The integers should range between 0 and 0xffff. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 使用显式查找表设置红色，绿色和蓝色的伽玛渐变。每个参数应为256个整数的序列。整数的范围应在 0 到 0xffff 之间。并非所有的系统和硬件都支持伽玛斜率，如果函数成功，它将返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma values on the display hardware. If the green and blue arguments are not passed, they will both be the same as red. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 在显示硬件上设置红色，绿色和蓝色的伽玛值。如果未传递绿色和蓝色参数，则它们都将与红色相同。并非所有的系统和硬件都支持伽玛斜率，如果函数成功，它将返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma values on the display hardware. If the green and blue arguments are not passed, they will both be the same as red. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示硬件上的红、绿、蓝伽玛值。如果没有传递绿色和蓝色参数,它们都将与红色相同。并非所有系统和硬件都支持伽玛值,如果函数成功,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Set the transparent colorkey
trans-unit.target: 设置透明色键

trans-unit.source: Set the volume (loudness) of a playing sound. When a channel starts to play its volume value is reset. This only affects the current sound. The value argument is between 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 设置播放声音的音量(响度)。当一个通道开始播放时,它的音量值被重置。这只影响当前的声音。参数值在 0.0 和 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: Set the volume of the music playback.
trans-unit.target: 设置音乐播放的音量。

trans-unit.source: Set the volume of the music playback. The value argument is between 0.0 and 1.0. When new music is loaded the volume is reset.
trans-unit.target: 设置音乐播放的音量。参数值在0.0和1.0之间。当加载新的音乐时,音量被重置。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 to require hardware acceleration, or 0 to force software render. By default, both are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置为1要求硬件加速,或0强制软件渲染。默认情况下,两者都允许。

trans-unit.source: Set to False to do monochrome rendering. This should provide a small speed gain and reduce cache memory size.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 False 进行单色渲染。这应该提供较小的速度增益并减小高速缓存的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set to True to add kerning between character pairs, if supported by the font, when positioning glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 可以在放置字形时在字符对之间添加字距调整（如果字体支持）。

trans-unit.source: Set to True to switch to a vertical text layout. The default is False, place horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 以切换到垂直文本布局。默认值为 False ，水平放置。

trans-unit.source: Set whether the screensaver may run
trans-unit.target: 设置屏幕保护程序是否可以运行

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits in the mask to 0.
trans-unit.target: 将掩码中的所有位设置为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits in the mask to 1.
trans-unit.target: 将掩码中的所有位设置为1。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits to 0
trans-unit.target: 将所有位设置为0

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits to 1
trans-unit.target: 将所有位数设为1

trans-unit.source: Sets coordinates x and y in place.
trans-unit.target: 设置坐标x和y的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets coordinates x, y, and z in place.
trans-unit.target: 将坐标x、y、z设置到位。

trans-unit.source: Sets smoothscale acceleration. Takes a string argument. A value of 'GENERIC' turns off acceleration. 'MMX' uses MMX instructions only. 'SSE' allows SSE extensions as well. A value error is raised if type is not recognized or not supported by the current processor.
trans-unit.target: 设置平滑比例加速度。采用字符串参数。值“ GENERIC”将关闭加速。“ MMX” 仅使用 MMX 指令。'SSE'也允许 SSE 扩展。如果当前处理器无法识别或不支持类型，则会引发值错误。

trans-unit.source: Sets the OpenGL profile to one of these values:
trans-unit.target: 将OpenGL配置文件设置为这些值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access mode for the clipboard. This is only of interest for X11 environments where clipboard modes pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION (for mouse selections) and pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD (for the clipboard) are available. Setting the mode to pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION in other environments will not change the mode from pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD.
trans-unit.target: 设置剪贴板的访问模式。这仅在剪贴板模式 pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION （用于鼠标选择）和 pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD （用于剪贴板）可用的X11环境中才有意义。在其他环境中将模式设置为 pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION 不会从 pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD 更改模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the array system to be used for sound arrays
trans-unit.target: 设置用于声音阵列的阵列系统。

trans-unit.source: Sets the array system to be used for surface arrays
trans-unit.target: 设置用于表面阵列的阵列系统。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bit at the given position
trans-unit.target: 设置给定位置的位

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipboard access mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置剪贴板访问模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the coordinates of the vector.
trans-unit.target: 设置向量的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the elements of the color
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色的元素

trans-unit.source: Sets the elements of the color. See parameters for pygame.Color() for the parameters of this function. If the alpha value was not set it will not change.
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色的元素。有关此函数的参数，请参见 pygame.Color() 的参数。如果未设置Alpha值，则不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of available channels for the mixer. The default value is 8. The value can be increased or decreased. If the value is decreased, sounds playing on the truncated channels are stopped.
trans-unit.target: 设置混音器的可用通道数。默认值为8。 该值可以增加或减少。如果降低该值,则会停止在被截断的通道上播放的声音。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position and size of the rectangle, in place. See parameters for pygame.Rect() for the parameters of this function.
trans-unit.target: 设置矩形的位置和大小。有关此函数的参数，请参见 pygame.Rect() 的参数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the runtime icon the system will use to represent the display window. All windows default to a simple pygame logo for the window icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置系统将使用的运行时图标来表示显示窗口。所有窗口的图标都默认为一个简单的pygame标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets x and y from a polar coordinates tuple.
trans-unit.target: 从极坐标元组中设置x和y。

trans-unit.source: Sets x and y from a tuple (r, phi) where r is the radial distance, and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 从一个元组(r,phi)中设置x和y,其中r是径向距离,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Sets x, y and z from a spherical coordinates 3-tuple.
trans-unit.target: 从球面坐标3元组中设置x、y和z。

trans-unit.source: Sets x, y and z from a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 从一个元组(r,theta,phi)中设置x,y和z,其中r是径向距离,theta是倾角,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Sets x, y and z from a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 根据元组 (r, theta, phi) 设置x，y和z ，其中r是径向距离，theta是倾斜角度，phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Shift the surface image in place
trans-unit.target: 移动表面图像的位置

trans-unit.source: Shows whether or not smoothscale is using MMX or SSE acceleration. If no acceleration is available then "GENERIC" is returned. For a x86 processor the level of acceleration to use is determined at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 显示平滑缩放是否正在使用 MMX 或 SSE 加速。如果没有可用的加速度，则返回“ GENERIC”。对于x86处理器，要在运行时确定要使用的加速级别。

trans-unit.source: Shut down the underlying FreeType library.
trans-unit.target: 关闭底层FreeType库。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Clock.get_time(), but does not include any time used while Clock.tick() was delaying to limit the framerate.
trans-unit.target: 与 Clock.get_time() 类似，但不包括 Clock.tick() 延迟限制帧率时使用的任何时间。

trans-unit.source: Simple base class for visible game objects.
trans-unit.target: 可见游戏对象的简单基类。

trans-unit.source: Simple test if a sprite intersects anything in a group.
trans-unit.target: 简单测试一个精灵是否与一个组中的任何东西相交。

trans-unit.source: So far it looks like normal pygame.event is faster by up to two times. So maybe fastevent isn't fast at all.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，看起来像普通的 pygame.event 快了两倍。因此，fastevent可能根本不够快。

trans-unit.source: Some aspects of pygame's behaviour can be controlled by setting environment variables, they cover a wide range of the library's functionality. Some of the variables are from pygame itself, while others come from the underlying C SDL library that pygame uses.
trans-unit.target: pygame的某些方面的行为可以通过设置环境变量来控制,它们涵盖了库的广泛功能。有些变量来自 pygame 本身,而有些则来自 pygame 使用的底层 C SDL 库。

trans-unit.source: Some display environments have an option for automatically stretching all windows. When this option is enabled, this automatic stretching distorts the appearance of the pygame window. In the pygame examples directory, there is example code (prevent_display_stretching.py) which shows how to disable this automatic stretching of the pygame display on Microsoft Windows (Vista or newer required).
trans-unit.target: 一些显示环境有一个自动拉伸所有窗口的选项。当启用这个选项时,自动拉伸会扭曲 pygame 窗口的外观。在 pygame 的例子目录中,有一个例子代码 (prevent_display_stretching.py),它展示了如何在 Microsoft Windows (需要 Vista 或更新版本)中禁用 pygame 显示的自动拉伸。

trans-unit.source: Some general information about the Vector2 class.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Vector2 类的一些常规信息。

trans-unit.source: Some general information about the Vector2 class.
trans-unit.target: 关于Vector2类的一些一般信息。

trans-unit.source: Some general information about the Vector3 class.
trans-unit.target: 关于Vector3类的一些一般信息。

trans-unit.source: Some of the transforms are considered destructive. These means every time they are performed they lose pixel data. Common examples of this are resizing and rotating. For this reason, it is better to re-transform the original surface than to keep transforming an image multiple times. (For example, suppose you are animating a bouncing spring which expands and contracts. If you applied the size changes incrementally to the previous images, you would lose detail. Instead, always begin with the original image and scale to the desired size.)
trans-unit.target: 有些变换被认为是破坏性的。这意味着每次执行这些变换都会丢失像素数据。常见的例子是调整大小和旋转。出于这个原因,重新变换原始表面比继续多次变换图像要好。(例如,假设您正在制作一个弹跳弹簧的动画,它将膨胀和收缩。如果您将尺寸变化逐步应用于之前的图像,您将失去细节。相反,总是从原始图像开始,然后缩放到所需的大小。)

trans-unit.source: Some platforms do not have a screensaver or support disabling the screensaver. Please see pygame.display.set_allow_screensaver() for caveats with screensaver support.
trans-unit.target: 某些平台没有屏幕保护程序，或者不支持禁用屏幕保护程序。有关支持屏幕保护程序的注意事项，请参见 pygame.display.set_allow_screensaver() 。

trans-unit.source: Some platforms require the pygame.mixer module to be initialized after the display modules have initialized. The top level pygame.init() takes care of this automatically, but cannot pass any arguments to the mixer init. To solve this, mixer has a function pygame.mixer.pre_init() to set the proper defaults before the toplevel init is used.
trans-unit.target: 某些平台要求在初始化显示模块后初始化 pygame.mixer 模块。顶层 pygame.init() 自动处理此问题，但无法将任何参数传递给Mixer初始化。为了解决这个问题，mixer具有函数 pygame.mixer.pre_init() ,可以在使用顶层init之前设置适当的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Some scalable fonts include embedded bitmaps for particular point sizes. This property controls whether or not those bitmap strikes are used. Set it False to disable the loading of any bitmap strike. Set it True, the default, to permit bitmap strikes for a non-rotated render with no style other than wide or underline. This property is ignored for bitmap fonts.
trans-unit.target: 一些可缩放字体包括用于特定磅值的嵌入式位图。此属性控制是否使用这些位图标记。将其设置为 False 可禁用任何位图警示的加载。它集 True ，默认，允许位为打击非旋转比其他没有风格呈现 wide 或 underline 。位图字体将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Some systems do not allow the window icon to change after it has been shown. This function can be called before pygame.display.set_mode() to create the icon before the display mode is set.
trans-unit.target: 某些系统不允许在显示窗口图标后对其进行更改。可以在 pygame.display.set_mode() 之前调用此函数，以在设置显示模式之前创建图标。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the black and white color values will be split into two separate XBM files. You can pass a second maskfile argument to load the two images into a single cursor.

trans-unit.source: Sound data is made of thousands of samples per second, and each sample is the amplitude of the wave at a particular moment in time. For example, in 22-kHz format, element number 5 of the array is the amplitude of the wave after 5/22000 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 声音数据是由每秒数千个样本组成的,每个样本是波在特定时刻的振幅。例如,在22-kHz的格式中,阵列的第5号元素就是5/22000秒后的波幅。

trans-unit.source: Sprites and Groups manage their relationships with the add() and remove() methods. These methods can accept a single or multiple targets for membership. The default initializers for these classes also takes a single or list of targets for initial membership. It is safe to repeatedly add and remove the same Sprite from a Group.
trans-unit.target: Sprite和Groups使用 add() 和 remove() 方法管理它们之间的关系。这些方法可以接受单个或多个目标成员资格。这些类的默认初始化器还采用单个或目标列表作为初始成员资格。从组中重复添加和删除相同的Sprite是安全的。

trans-unit.source: Sprites are not thread safe. So lock them yourself if using threads.
trans-unit.target: 精灵不是线程安全的。所以如果使用螺纹的话,要自己锁定它们。

trans-unit.source: Surfaces can also reference sections of other Surfaces. These are created with the subsurface() method. Any change to either Surface will effect the other.
trans-unit.target: 曲面也可以引用其他曲面的截面。这些是使用 subsurface() 方法创建的。任何一个Surface的更改都会影响另一个。

trans-unit.source: Surfaces can have many extra attributes like alpha planes, colorkeys, source rectangle clipping. These functions mainly effect how the Surface is blitted to other Surfaces. The blit routines will attempt to use hardware acceleration when possible, otherwise they will use highly optimized software blitting methods.
trans-unit.target: 曲面可以有很多额外的属性,比如alpha平面、颜色键、源矩形剪切。这些功能主要影响Surface与其他Surface的混合。blit例程会在可能的情况下尝试使用硬件加速,否则它们会使用高度优化的软件blitting方法。

trans-unit.source: Surfaces should not remain locked for more than necessary. A locked Surface can often not be displayed or managed by pygame.
trans-unit.target: 曲面的锁定时间不应超过必要的时间。被锁定的Surface通常不能被pygame显示或管理。

trans-unit.source: Switch between fullscreen and windowed displays
trans-unit.target: 在全屏和窗口显示之间进行切换

trans-unit.source: Switches the display window between windowed and fullscreen modes. Display driver support is not great when using pygame 1, but with pygame 2 it is the most reliable method to switch to and from fullscreen.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口和全屏模式之间切换显示窗口。使用 pygame 1 时,显示驱动支持不是很好,但使用 pygame 2 时,这是最可靠的切换到全屏和全屏的方法。

trans-unit.source: Switches the display window between windowed and fullscreen modes. This function only works under the UNIX X11 video driver. For most situations it is better to call pygame.display.set_mode() with new display flags.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口模式和全屏模式之间切换显示窗口。此功能仅在UNIX X11视频驱动程序下有效。在大多数情况下，最好使用新的显示标志调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 。

trans-unit.target: 测试cdrom模块是否已初始化。这与 CD.init() 不同，因为每个驱动器也必须单独初始化。

trans-unit.target: 测试此 CDROM 设备是否已初始化。这与 pygame.cdrom.init() 不同，因为每个驱动器也必须分别初始化。

trans-unit.source: Test whether the rectangle collides with any in a sequence of rectangles. The index of the first collision found is returned. If no collisions are found an index of -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 测试矩形是否与矩形序列中的任何一个相撞。返回第一个碰撞的索引。如果没有发现碰撞,则返回-1的索引。

trans-unit.source: Tested on Windows XP SP2 Athlon, and FreeBSD.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows XP SP2 Athlon和FreeBSD上测试。

trans-unit.source: Tests are run in a randomized order if the randomize argument is True or a seed argument is provided. If no seed integer is provided then the system time is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果随机化参数为True或者提供了种子参数,测试将以随机顺序运行。如果没有提供种子参数,则使用系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Tests for collision between two sprites, by testing if their bitmasks overlap (uses pygame.mask.Mask.overlap()). If the sprites have a mask attribute, it is used as the mask, otherwise a mask is created from the sprite's image (uses pygame.mask.from_surface()). Sprites must have a rect attribute; the mask attribute is optional.
trans-unit.target: 通过测试两个精灵之间的碰撞，测试它们的位掩码是否重叠（使用 pygame.mask.Mask.overlap() ）。如果子画面具有 mask 属性，则将其用作遮罩，否则从子画面的 image 创建遮罩（使用 pygame.mask.from_surface() ）。子画面必须具有 rect 属性；所述 mask 属性是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Tests for collision between two sprites, by testing if their bitmasks overlap. If the sprites have a "mask" attribute, that is used as the mask, otherwise a mask is created from the sprite image. Intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions. Sprites must have a "rect" and an optional "mask" attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过测试两个精灵的位面是否重叠来测试它们之间的碰撞。如果精灵有 "mask "属性,则使用该属性作为遮罩,否则将从精灵图像中创建一个遮罩。打算作为碰撞回调函数传递给*collide函数。魍魉必须有一个 "rect "和一个可选的 "mask "属性。

trans-unit.source: Tests for collision between two sprites, by testing to see if two circles centered on the sprites overlap. If the sprites have a "radius" attribute, that is used to create the circle, otherwise a circle is created that is big enough to completely enclose the sprites rect as given by the "rect" attribute. Intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions. Sprites must have a "rect" and an optional "radius" attribute.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个精灵之间的碰撞,测试以精灵为中心的两个圆是否重叠。如果精灵有一个 "半径 "属性,则用来创建圆圈,否则将创建一个足够大的圆圈,以完全包围由 "rect "属性给出的精灵矩形。打算作为碰撞回调函数传递给*collide函数。Sprites必须有一个 "rect "和一个可选的 "radius "属性。

trans-unit.source: Tests for collision between two sprites. Uses the pygame rect colliderect function to calculate the collision. Intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions. Sprites must have a "rect" attributes.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个精灵之间的碰撞。使用 pygame rect colliderect 函数来计算碰撞。打算作为碰撞回调函数传递给*collide函数。Sprites必须有 "rect "属性。

trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.key 模块列出了键盘的常量和改性剂（ K_ *和 MOD_ *）有关的 key 和 mod 的属性 KEYDOWN 和 KEYUP 事件。

trans-unit.target: 返回 BufferProxy 对象或传递给 BufferProxy 调用的对象的 Surface 。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.Surface.fill() method works just as well for drawing filled rectangles and can be hardware accelerated on some platforms with both software and hardware display modes.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.Surface.fill() 方法效果一样好绘制填充的矩形，并且可以硬件加速在某些平台上使用软件和硬件的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.Surface.fill() method works just as well for drawing filled rectangles. In fact pygame.Surface.fill() can be hardware accelerated on some platforms with both software and hardware display modes.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.Surface.fill() 方法效果一样好绘制填充的矩形。实际上，在某些同时具有软件和硬件显示模式的平台上，可以对 pygame.Surface.fill() 进行硬件加速。
