trans-unit.target: 该 CD 的对象没有初始化，您只可以调用 CD.get_id() 和 CD.get_name() 未初始化的驱动器上。

trans-unit.source: The CMY representation of the Color. The CMY components are in the ranges C = [0, 1], M = [0, 1], Y = [0, 1]. Note that this will not return the absolutely exact CMY values for the set RGB values in all cases. Due to the RGB mapping from 0-255 and the CMY mapping from 0-1 rounding errors may cause the CMY values to differ slightly from what you might expect.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 CMY 表示形式。的 CMY 分量在范围 C ^ = [0，1]， M = [0，1]， Y = [0，1]。请注意，在所有情况下，这都不会返回所设置 RGB 值的绝对准确的 CMY 值。由于 RGB 映射从0-255和 CMY 映射从0-1舍入错误可能会导致 CMY 值与您期望的值略有不同。

trans-unit.source: The Color class represents RGBA color values using a value range of 0 to 255 inclusive. It allows basic arithmetic operations — binary operations +, -, *, //, %, and unary operation ~ — to create new colors, supports conversions to other color spaces such as HSV or HSL and lets you adjust single color channels. Alpha defaults to 255 (fully opaque) when not given. The arithmetic operations and correct_gamma() method preserve subclasses. For the binary operators, the class of the returned color is that of the left hand color object of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 的 Color 类表示 RGBA 使用0到255包括的范围内的值的颜色值。它允许基本的算术运算（二进制运算 + ， - ， * ， // ， % 和一元运算 ~ ）来创建新颜色，支持转换为其他颜色空间（例如 HSV 或 HSL ),并允许您调整单个颜色通道。如果未指定，则Alpha默认为255（完全不透明）。算术运算和 correct_gamma() 方法保留子类。对于二进制运算符，返回的颜色的类别是该运算符的左侧颜色对象的类别。

trans-unit.source: The HSLA representation of the Color. The HSLA components are in the ranges H = [0, 360], S = [0, 100], V = [0, 100], A = [0, 100]. Note that this will not return the absolutely exact HSL values for the set RGB values in all cases. Due to the RGB mapping from 0-255 and the HSL mapping from 0-100 and 0-360 rounding errors may cause the HSL values to differ slightly from what you might expect.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 HSLA 表示形式。的 HSLA 部件在范围 H = [0，360]， S = [0,100]， V = [0,100]，A = [0，100]。请注意，在所有情况下，这都不会为设置的 RGB 值返回绝对准确的 HSL 值。由于从0-255 的 RGB 映射以及从0-100和0-360 的 HSL 映射，舍入错误可能会导致 HSL 值与您期望的值略有不同。

trans-unit.source: The HSVA representation of the Color. The HSVA components are in the ranges H = [0, 360], S = [0, 100], V = [0, 100], A = [0, 100]. Note that this will not return the absolutely exact HSV values for the set RGB values in all cases. Due to the RGB mapping from 0-255 and the HSV mapping from 0-100 and 0-360 rounding errors may cause the HSV values to differ slightly from what you might expect.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 HSVA 表示形式。的 HSVA 部件在范围 H = [0，360]， S = [0,100]， V = [0,100]，A = [0，100]。请注意，在所有情况下，这都不会返回所设置 RGB 值的绝对准确的 HSV 值。由于 RGB 映射的范围是0-255， HSV 映射的范围是0-100和0-360，因此舍入错误可能会导致 HSV 值与您期望的值略有不同。

trans-unit.source: The I1I2I3 representation of the Color. The I1I2I3 components are in the ranges I1 = [0, 1], I2 = [-0.5, 0.5], I3 = [-0.5, 0.5]. Note that this will not return the absolutely exact I1I2I3 values for the set RGB values in all cases. Due to the RGB mapping from 0-255 and the I1I2I3 mapping from 0-1 rounding errors may cause the I1I2I3 values to differ slightly from what you might expect.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的 I1I2I3 表示形式。的 I1I2I3 部件在范围 I1 = [0，1]， I2 = [-0.5,0.5]， I3 = [-0.5，0.5]。请注意，在所有情况下，这都不会返回设置的 RGB 值的绝对准确的 I1I2I3 值。由于从0-255 的 RGB 映射和从0-1的四舍五入的 I1I2I3 映射可能导致 I1I2I3 值与您期望的值略有不同。

trans-unit.source: The OPENGL flags are:
trans-unit.target: 该 OPENGL 标志是：

trans-unit.source: The STYLE_OBLIQUE and STYLE_STRONG styles are for scalable fonts only. An attempt to set either for a bitmap font raises an AttributeError. An attempt to set either for an inactive font, as returned by Font.__new__(), raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 该 STYLE_OBLIQUE 和 STYLE_STRONG 风格仅用于可缩放字体。尝试为位图字体设置任何一个都会引发AttributeError。尝试为 Font.__new__() 返回的无效字体设置任何一个，都会引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: The arraytype parameter is deprecated; passing any value besides 'numpy' will raise ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 的 arraytype 参数被弃用; 传递除“ numpy”以外的任何值将引发ValueError。

trans-unit.source: The buffer_size specifies the number of output events to be buffered waiting for output. In some cases (see below) PortMidi does not buffer output at all and merely passes data to a lower-level API, in which case buffersize is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所述 buffer_size 指定要缓冲的输出事件数等待输出。在某些情况下（见下文），PortMidi根本不缓冲输出，而只是将数据传递给较低级别​​的API，在这种情况下，buffersize被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The every optional parameter skips set bits in the outline. For example, setting it to 10 would return a list of every 10th set bit in the outline.
trans-unit.target: 在 every 可选参数跳过在大纲中的位。例如，将其设置为10将返回轮廓中每第10个设置位的列表。

trans-unit.source: The midi_events data is expected to be a sequence of ((status, data1, data2, data3), timestamp) midi events (all values required).
trans-unit.target: 该 midi_events 数据预计的序列 ((status, data1, data2, data3), timestamp) 的MIDI事件（所有值所需的）。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.JOYAXISMOTION events will be in the range from -1.0 to 1.0. A value of 0.0 means the axis is centered. Gamepad devices will usually be -1, 0, or 1 with no values in between. Older analog joystick axes will not always use the full -1 to 1 range, and the centered value will be some area around 0. Analog joysticks usually have a bit of noise in their axis, which will generate a lot of rapid small motion events.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.JOYAXISMOTION 事件将在范围-1.0到1.0。值0.0表示轴居中。Gamepad设备通常为-1、0或1，中间没有值。较旧的模拟操纵杆轴将不会始终使用-1到1的完整范围，并且中心值将在0周围的某个区域。模拟操纵杆的轴上通常会有一些噪点，这会产生许多快速的小运动事件。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.JOYAXISMOTION events will be in the range from -1.0 to 1.0. A value of 0.0 means the axis is centered. Gamepad devices will usually be -1, 0, or 1 with no values in between. Older analog joystick axes will not always use the full -1 to 1 range, and the centered value will be some area around 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.JOYAXISMOTION 事件将在范围从 -1.0 至 1.0 。值 0.0 表示轴居中。手柄装置通常将是 -1 ， 0 ，或 1 与在之间不存在的值。较旧的模拟操纵杆轴将不会始终使用 -1 到 1 的完整范围，并且中心值将在 0 周围的某个区域。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.JOYBALLMOTION event will be sent when the trackball is rolled. It will report the amount of movement on the trackball.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.JOYBALLMOTION 当轨迹球被卷事件将被发送。它将报告轨迹球上的移动量。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.JOYHATMOTION event is generated when the hat changes position. The position attribute for the event contains a pair of values that are either -1, 0, or 1. A position of (0, 0) means the hat is centered.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.JOYHATMOTION 当帽子改变位置生成的事件。的 position 为事件属性包含一对或者是值的 -1 ， 0 ，或 1 。位置 (0, 0) 表示帽子居中。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.JOYHATMOTION event is generated when the hat changes position. The position attribute for the event contains a pair of values that are either -1, 0, or 1. A position of (0, 0) means the hat is centered.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.JOYHATMOTION 当帽子改变位置生成的事件。事件的position属性包含一对值为-1、0或1的值。位置（0，0）表示帽子居中。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.KEYDOWN event has additional attributes unicode and scancode. unicode represents a single character string that is the fully translated character entered. This takes into account the shift and composition keys. scancode represents the platform-specific key code. This could be different from keyboard to keyboard, but is useful for key selection of weird keys like the multimedia keys.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.KEYDOWN 事件具有附加属性 unicode 和 scancode 。 unicode 表示单个字符串，它是输入的完全翻译的字符。这考虑了shift键和构图键。 scancode 代表特定于平台的密钥代码。这可能因键盘而异，但是对于诸如多媒体键之类的奇怪键的键选择很有用。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.KEYDOWN event has the additional attributes unicode and scancode.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.KEYDOWN 事件具有附加属性 unicode 和 scancode 。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.freetype module is a replacement for pygame.font. It has all of the functionality of the original, plus many new features. Yet is has absolutely no dependencies on the SDL_ttf library. It is implemented directly on the FreeType 2 library. The pygame.freetype module is not itself backward compatible with pygame.font. Instead, use the pygame.ftfont module as a drop-in replacement for pygame.font.
trans-unit.target: 该 pygame.freetype 模块进行更换 pygame.font 。它具有原始功能，以及许多新功能。但是绝对不依赖SDL_ttf库。它直接在FreeType 2库上实现。该 pygame.freetype 模块本身不向下兼容 pygame.font 。而是使用 pygame.ftfont 模块替代 pygame.font 。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.pixelcopy module contains functions for copying between surfaces and objects exporting an array structure interface. It is a backend for pygame.surfarray, adding NumPy support. But pixelcopy is more general, and intended for direct use.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pygame.pixelcopy 模块包含用于表面和物体出口阵列结构之间的接口复印功能。它是 pygame.surfarray 的后端，增加了NumPy支持。但是pixelcopy更为通用，可以直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The rect.bottom and rect.right attributes of a pygame.Rect always lie one pixel outside of its actual border.
trans-unit.target: 该 rect.bottom 和 rect.right 一个属性 pygame.Rect 总是位于它的实际边界的一个像素之外。

trans-unit.source: The rect.bottom and rect.right attributes of a pygame.Rect always lie one pixel outside of its actual border. Therefore, these values will not be included as part of the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 该 rect.bottom 和 rect.right 一个属性 pygame.Rect 总是位于它的实际边界的一个像素之外。因此，这些值将不包含在图形中。

trans-unit.source: The time argument denotes the integer milliseconds for which the fading effect is generated.
trans-unit.target: 的 time 参数表示被生成了衰落效应的整数毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The volume argument is a float between 0.0 and 1.0 that sets volume. When new music is loaded the volume is reset to full volume.
trans-unit.target: 的 volume 参数是之间的浮子 0.0 和 1.0 ，其设定的体积。加载新音乐后，音量将重设为全音量。

trans-unit.source: The Bayer to RGB function is based on:
trans-unit.target: 从拜耳到 RGB 的功能基于：

trans-unit.source: The BufferProxy class supports subclassing, instance variables, and weak references.
trans-unit.target: BufferProxy类支持子类、实例变量和弱引用。

trans-unit.source: The Channel object can be used to get fine control over the playback of Sounds. A channel can only playback a single Sound at time. Using channels is entirely optional since pygame can manage them by default.
trans-unit.target: 通道对象可以用来对声音的播放进行精细控制。一个通道一次只能播放一个声音。使用通道是完全可选的,因为 pygame 可以默认管理它们。

trans-unit.source: The Group does not keep sprites in any order, so the draw order is arbitrary.
trans-unit.target: 本组不按任何顺序保存精灵,所以绘制顺序是任意的。

trans-unit.source: The GroupSingle container only holds a single Sprite. When a new Sprite is added, the old one is removed.
trans-unit.target: GroupSingle容器只能容纳一个Sprite。当添加新的Sprite时,旧的Sprite会被移除。

trans-unit.source: The Joystick must be initialized to get most of the information about the controls. While the Joystick is initialized the pygame event queue will receive events from the Joystick input.
trans-unit.target: Joystick必须被初始化以获得大部分的控制信息。当操纵杆被初始化时,pygame事件队列将接收来自操纵杆输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: The Joystick object allows you to get information about the types of controls on a joystick device. Once the device is initialized the pygame event queue will start receiving events about its input.
trans-unit.target: Joystick对象允许你获取操纵杆设备上控制类型的信息。一旦设备被初始化,pygame事件队列将开始接收关于其输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: The Mercurial node identifier of the repository checkout from which this package was built. If the identifier ends with a plus sign '+' then the package contains uncommitted changes. Please include this revision number in bug reports, especially for non-release pygame builds.
trans-unit.target: 这个包是由Mercurial节点标识符建立的。如果标识符以加号'+'结尾,那么该软件包包含未提交的更改。请在错误报告中包含这个版本号,特别是对于非发布的pygame构建。

trans-unit.source: The Overlay format determines the type of pixel data used. Not all hardware will support all types of overlay formats. Here is a list of available format types:
trans-unit.target: 叠加格式决定了使用的像素数据类型。并非所有硬件都支持所有类型的叠加格式。以下是可用的格式类型列表。

trans-unit.source: The Overlay objects provide support for accessing hardware video overlays. Video overlays do not use standard RGB pixel formats, and can use multiple resolutions of data to create a single image.
trans-unit.target: 叠加层对象提供了对访问硬件视频叠加层的支持。视频叠加层不使用标准的 RGB 像素格式，并且可以使用多种分辨率的数据来创建单个图像。

trans-unit.source: The Overlay objects represent lower level access to the display hardware. To use the object you must understand the technical details of video overlays.
trans-unit.target: 叠加对象代表对显示硬件的低级访问。要使用该对象,您必须了解视频叠加的技术细节。

trans-unit.source: The PixelArray wraps a Surface and provides direct access to the surface's pixels. A pixel array can be one or two dimensional. A two dimensional array, like its surface, is indexed [column, row]. Pixel arrays support slicing, both for returning a subarray or for assignment. A pixel array sliced on a single column or row returns a one dimensional pixel array. Arithmetic and other operations are not supported. A pixel array can be safely assigned to itself. Finally, pixel arrays export an array struct interface, allowing them to interact with pygame.pixelcopy methods and NumPy arrays.
trans-unit.target: PixelArray包裹了Surface并提供对表面像素的直接访问。像素阵列可以是一维或二维的。像其表面一样，将二维数组索引为[列，行]。像素阵列支持切片，无论是返回子阵列还是分配。切片在单个列或行上的像素阵列返回一维像素阵列。不支持算术和其他运算。可以将像素阵列安全地分配给它自己。最后，像素数组导出数组结构接口，从而允许它们与 pygame.pixelcopy 方法和NumPy数组进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The Rect functions that change the position or size of a Rect return a new copy of the Rect with the affected changes. The original Rect is not modified. Some methods have an alternate "in-place" version that returns None but affects the original Rect. These "in-place" methods are denoted with the "ip" suffix.
trans-unit.target: 改变Rect位置或大小的Rect函数会返回一个新的Rect副本,其中包含受影响的变化。原始的Rect不会被修改。有些方法有一个备用的 "原地 "版本,它返回None,但会影响原始Rect。这些 "原地 "方法用后缀 "ip "表示。

trans-unit.source: The Rect functions that change the position or size of a Rect return a new copy of the Rect with the affected changes. The original Rect is not modified. Some methods have an alternate "in-place" version that returns None but effects the original Rect. These "in-place" methods are denoted with the "ip" suffix.
trans-unit.target: 改变Rect位置或大小的Rect函数会返回一个新的Rect副本,其中包含受影响的变化。原始的Rect不会被修改。有些方法有一个备用的 "原地 "版本,它返回 "无",但会影响原来的Rect。这些 "原地 "方法用后缀 "ip "表示。

trans-unit.source: The Rect object has several virtual attributes which can be used to move and align the Rect:
trans-unit.target: 矩形对象有几个虚拟属性,可以用来移动和对齐矩形。

trans-unit.source: The Sound can be loaded from an OGG audio file or from an uncompressed WAV.
trans-unit.target: 可以从 OGG 音频文件或未压缩的 WAV 加载声音。

trans-unit.source: The Sound object represents actual sound sample data. Methods that change the state of the Sound object will the all instances of the Sound playback. A Sound object also exports an array interface, and, for Python 2.6 or later, a new buffer interface.
trans-unit.target: Sound对象代表实际的声音样本数据。改变Sound对象的状态的方法将所有的Sound播放实例。一个Sound对象还输出了一个数组接口,对于Python 2.6或更高版本,还输出了一个新的缓冲区接口。

trans-unit.source: The Sprite class is intended to be used as a base class for the different types of objects in the game. There is also a base Group class that simply stores sprites. A game could create new types of Group classes that operate on specially customized Sprite instances they contain.
trans-unit.target: Sprite类是用来作为游戏中不同类型对象的基类。还有一个基础的Group类,它只是简单地存储Sprite。游戏可以创建新类型的Group类,对其包含的特别定制的Sprite实例进行操作。

trans-unit.source: The Sprite is removed from all the Groups that contain it. This won't change anything about the state of the Sprite. It is possible to continue to use the Sprite after this method has been called, including adding it to Groups.
trans-unit.target: 该Sprite将从包含它的所有组中移除。这不会改变Sprite的任何状态。在这个方法被调用后,可以继续使用该Sprite,包括将其添加到Group中。

trans-unit.source: The Sprites in the Group are not ordered, so drawing and iterating the Sprites is in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 组中的Sprites是没有顺序的,所以绘制和迭代Sprites是没有特定顺序的。

trans-unit.source: The Surface returned will be of the dimensions required to hold the text. (the same as those returned by Font.size()). If an empty string is passed for the text, a blank surface will be returned that is one pixel wide and the height of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Surface将是容纳文本所需的尺寸。(与Font.size()返回的尺寸相同)。如果文本是空字符串,将返回一个空白的表面,宽度为一个像素,高度为字体的高度。

trans-unit.source: The Surface returned will be of the dimensions required to hold the text. (the same as those returned by Font.size()). If an empty string is passed for the text, a blank surface will be returned that is zero pixel wide and the height of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Surface将是容纳文本所需的尺寸。(与Font.size()返回的尺寸相同)。如果文本传递的是空字符串,那么将返回一个空白的表面,宽度为零像素,高度为字体的高度。

trans-unit.source: The Surface that gets returned can be drawn to like a regular Surface but changes will eventually be seen on the monitor.
trans-unit.target: 被退回的Surface可以像普通的Surface一样绘制,但最终会在显示器上看到变化。

trans-unit.source: The Surface the PixelArray was created for.
trans-unit.target: PixelArray创建的表面。

trans-unit.source: The Surface this array references will remain locked for the lifetime of the array.
trans-unit.target: 这个数组引用的Surface将在数组的生命周期内保持锁定。

trans-unit.source: The Surface this references will remain locked for the lifetime of the array (see the pygame.Surface.lock() - lock the Surface memory for pixel access method).
trans-unit.target: 此引用的Surface将在数组的生存 pygame.Surface.lock() 保持锁定状态（请参阅pygame.Surface.lock（） -锁定Surface内存以进行像素访问方法）。

trans-unit.source: The adjacent coordinates in the points argument, as well as the first and last points, will be connected by line segments. e.g. For the points [(x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3)] a line segment will be drawn from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2), from (x2, y2) to (x3, y3), and from (x3, y3) to (x1, y1).
trans-unit.target: points 参数中的相邻坐标以及第一个和最后一个点将通过线段连接。例如对于点 [(x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3)] 线段将从 (x1, y1) 到 (x2, y2) ，从 (x2, y2) 到 (x3, y3) ，以及从 (x3, y3) 到 (x1, y1) 。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which a font glyph's size is enlarged for the strong or wide transformations, as a fraction of the untransformed size. For the wide style only the horizontal dimension is increased. For strong text both the horizontal and vertical dimensions are enlarged. A wide style of strength 0.08333 ( 1/12 ) is equivalent to the pygame.font.Font bold style. The default is 0.02778 ( 1/36 ).
trans-unit.target: 对于强转换或宽转换，字体字形的大小被放大的量，为未转换大小的一部分。对于宽样式，仅增加水平尺寸。对于强文本，水平和垂直尺寸均被放大。宽强度样式0.08333（1/12）等效于 pygame.font.Font 粗体样式。默认值为0.02778（1/36）。

trans-unit.source: The area covered by a Rect does not include the right- and bottom-most edge of pixels. If one Rect's bottom border is another Rect's top border (i.e., rect1.bottom=rect2.top), the two meet exactly on the screen but do not overlap, and rect1.colliderect(rect2) returns false.
trans-unit.target: Rect覆盖的区域不包括像素的最右边缘和最下边缘。如果一个Rect的底部边框是另一个Rect的顶部边框（即rect1.bottom = rect2.top），则两者在屏幕上完全会合但不重叠，并且 rect1.colliderect(rect2) 返回false。

trans-unit.source: The array element type as a length 3 string. The first character gives byteorder, '<' for little-endian, '>' for big-endian, and '|' for not applicable. The second character is the element type, 'i' for signed integer, 'u' for unsigned integer, 'f' for floating point, and 'V' for an chunk of bytes. The third character gives the bytesize of the element, from '1' to '9' bytes. So, for example, "<u4" is an unsigned 4 byte little-endian integer, such as a 32 bit pixel on a PC, while "|V3" would represent a 24 bit pixel, which has no integer equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素类型为长度为3的字符串。第一个字符给出字节顺序，“ <”代表小端，“>”代表大端，“ |”不适用。第二个字符是元素类型，“ i”代表有符号整数，“ u”代表无符号整数，“ f”代表浮点，“ V”代表一字节字节。第三个字符给出元素的字节大小，从'1'到'9'字节。因此，例如，“ <u4”是一个无符号的4字节小尾数整数，例如PC上的32位像素，而“ | V3”则表示一个24位像素，没有等效的整数。

trans-unit.source: The array struct interface exposes an array's data in a standard way. It was introduced in NumPy. In Python 2.7 and above it is replaced by the new buffer protocol, though the buffer protocol is still a work in progress. The array struct interface, on the other hand, is stable and works with earlier Python versions. So for now the array struct interface is the predominate way pygame handles array introspection.
trans-unit.target: 数组结构接口以标准的方式暴露了一个数组的数据。它是在 NumPy 中引入的。在Python 2.7及以上版本中,它被新的缓冲区协议所取代,尽管缓冲区协议仍然是一个正在进行的工作。而数组结构体接口则是稳定的,并且可以在早期的Python版本中使用。所以目前数组struct接口是pygame处理数组自省的主要方式。

trans-unit.source: The arrays are indexed by the X axis first, followed by the Y axis. Arrays that treat the pixels as a single integer are referred to as 2D arrays. This module can also separate the red, green, and blue color values into separate indices. These types of arrays are referred to as 3D arrays, and the last index is 0 for red, 1 for green, and 2 for blue.
trans-unit.target: 数组首先由 X 轴索引，然后由 Y 轴索引。将像素视为单个整数的阵列称为2D阵列。该模块还可以将红色，绿色和蓝色值分成单独的索引。这些类型的数组称为3D数组，最后的索引是0（红色），1（绿色）和2（蓝色）。

trans-unit.source: The axis number must be an integer from 0 to get_numaxes() - 1.
trans-unit.target: 轴号必须是从 0 到 get_numaxes() - 1 的整数。

trans-unit.target: 轴号必须是一个从0到get_numaxes()-1的整数。

trans-unit.source: The background is usually a Surface image the same dimensions as the destination Surface. However, it can also be a callback function that takes two arguments; the destination Surface and an area to clear. The background callback function will be called several times each clear.
trans-unit.target: 背景通常是一个与目标Surface尺寸相同的Surface图像,但它也可以是一个回调函数,需要两个参数;目标Surface和要清除的区域。然而,它也可以是一个回调函数,它需要两个参数:目标Surface和一个要清除的区域。每次清除时,背景回调函数都会被调用几次。

trans-unit.source: The ball number must be an integer from 0 to get_numballs() - 1.
trans-unit.target: 球号必须是从 0 到 get_numballs() - 1 的整数。

trans-unit.source: The ball number must be an integer from zero to get_numballs()-1.
trans-unit.target: 球数必须是一个整数,从0到get_numballs()-1。

trans-unit.source: The base class for visible game objects. Derived classes will want to override the Sprite.update() and assign a Sprite.image and Sprite.rect attributes. The initializer can accept any number of Group instances to be added to.
trans-unit.target: 可见游戏对象的基类。派生的类将要重写 Sprite.update() 并分配 Sprite.image 和 Sprite.rect 属性。初始化程序可以接受任意数量的要添加到的Group实例。

trans-unit.source: The basic Sprite class can draw the Sprites it contains to a Surface. The Group.draw() method requires that each Sprite have a Surface.image attribute and a Surface.rect. The Group.clear() method requires these same attributes, and can be used to erase all the Sprites with background. There are also more advanced Groups: pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates() and pygame.sprite.OrderedUpdates().
trans-unit.target: 基本的Sprite类可以将其包含的Sprite绘制到Surface。所述 Group.draw() 方法要求每个精灵具有 Surface.image 属性和 Surface.rect 。所述 Group.clear() 方法需要这些相同的属性，并且可以被用于擦除所有的精灵与背景。还有更高级的组： pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates() 和 pygame.sprite.OrderedUpdates() 。

trans-unit.source: The blue value of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 色的蓝色值。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box min_x, max_x, min_y, and max_y values are returned as grid-fitted pixel coordinates of type int. The advance values are float values.
trans-unit.target: 边界框的min_x、max_x、min_y和max_y值是以int类型的网格拟合像素坐标返回的。预设值是浮动值。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box min_x, max_y, min_y, and max_y values are returned as grid-fitted pixel coordinates of type int. The advance values are float values.

trans-unit.source: The buffer argument controls the number of internal samples used in the sound mixer. The default value should work for most cases. It can be lowered to reduce latency, but sound dropout may occur. It can be raised to larger values to ensure playback never skips, but it will impose latency on sound playback. The buffer size must be a power of two (if not it is rounded up to the next nearest power of 2).
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区参数控制混音器中使用的内部样本数量。默认值应该适用于大多数情况。它可以降低以减少延迟,但可能会出现声音丢失。它可以提高到更大的值,以确保回放永远不会跳过,但它会对声音回放造成延迟。缓冲区大小必须是2的幂数(如果不是,则四舍五入到最接近的2的幂数)。

trans-unit.source: The buffer data as a str/bytes object. Any gaps in the exported data are removed.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区数据作为 str / bytes 对象。导出数据中的所有空白都将被删除。

trans-unit.source: The calculations are done using the font's default size in points. Optionally you may specify another point size with the size argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用字体的默认大小（以磅为单位）进行计算。（可选）您可以使用size参数指定另一个点大小。

trans-unit.source: The caller should immediately close the output port; this call may result in transmission of a partial midi message. There is no abort for Midi input because the user can simply ignore messages in the buffer and close an input device at any time.
trans-unit.target: 调用者应立即关闭输出端口;该调用可能会导致部分midi信息的传输。对Midi输入来说,没有中止,因为用户可以忽略缓冲区中的信息,并在任何时候关闭输入设备。

trans-unit.source: The cdrom module manages the CD and DVD drives on a computer. It can also control the playback of audio CDs. This module needs to be initialized before it can do anything. Each CD object you create represents a cdrom drive and must also be initialized individually before it can do most things.
trans-unit.target: cdrom模块管理计算机上的 CD 和 DVD 驱动器。它还可以控制音频CD的播放。该模块需要先初始化，然后才能执行任何操作。您创建的每个 CD 对象都代表一个cdrom驱动器，并且在执行大多数操作之前还必须单独进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The channels argument is used to specify whether to use mono or stereo. 1 for mono and 2 for stereo.
trans-unit.target: 通道参数用于指定是使用单声道还是立体声,1为单声道,2为立体声。1代表单声道,2代表立体声。

trans-unit.source: The clipping area is always restricted to the area of the Surface itself. If the clip rectangle is too large it will be shrunk to fit inside the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 剪裁区域总是被限制在Surface本身的区域内。如果剪裁矩形过大,它将被缩小以适应Surface内部。

trans-unit.source: The collided argument is a callback function used to calculate if two sprites are colliding. It should take two sprites as values and return a bool value indicating if they are colliding. If collided is not passed, then all sprites must have a "rect" value, which is a rectangle of the sprite area, which will be used to calculate the collision.
trans-unit.target: collided参数是一个回调函数,用于计算两个精灵是否发生碰撞。它应该把两个精灵作为值,并返回一个表示它们是否在碰撞的bool值。如果没有传递collided,那么所有的精灵都必须有一个 "rect "值,这是一个精灵区域的矩形,它将被用来计算碰撞。

trans-unit.source: The collided argument is a callback function used to calculate if two sprites are colliding. it should take two sprites as values, and return a bool value indicating if they are colliding. If collided is not passed, all sprites must have a "rect" value, which is a rectangle of the sprite area, which will be used to calculate the collision.
trans-unit.target: collided参数是一个回调函数,用于计算两个精灵是否发生碰撞,它应该把两个精灵作为值,并返回一个表示它们是否发生碰撞的bool值。如果没有传递collided,所有的精灵都必须有一个 "rect "值,这是一个精灵区域的矩形,它将被用来计算碰撞。

trans-unit.source: The color argument can be either a RGB sequence, a RGBA sequence or a mapped color index. If using RGBA, the Alpha (A part of RGBA) is ignored unless the surface uses per pixel alpha (Surface has the SRCALPHA flag).
trans-unit.target: color参数可以是 RGB 序列， RGBA 序列或映射的颜色索引。如果使用 RGBA ，则除非表面使用每个像素alpha（表面具有 SRCALPHA 标志），否则将忽略Alpha（ RGBA 的一部分）。

trans-unit.source: The colorkey will be ignored if the Surface is formatted to use per pixel alpha values. The colorkey can be mixed with the full Surface alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 如果Surface被格式化为使用每个像素的alpha值,那么这个colorkey将被忽略。colorey可以与整个Surface的alpha值混合使用。

trans-unit.source: The converted Surface will have no pixel alphas. They will be stripped if the original had them. See convert_alpha() for preserving or creating per-pixel alphas.
trans-unit.target: 转换后的Surface将没有像素alpha。如果原件有它们，它们将被剥夺。有关保留或创建每个像素的Alpha，请参见 convert_alpha() 。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates for Rect objects are all integers. The size values can be programmed to have negative values, but these are considered illegal Rects for most operations.
trans-unit.target: Rect对象的坐标都是整数。大小值可以编程为负值,但对于大多数操作来说,这些都是非法的Rects。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a vector can be retrieved or set using attributes or subscripts
trans-unit.target: 矢量的坐标可以通过属性或下标来检索或设置。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a vector can be retrieved or set using attributes or subscripts:
trans-unit.target: 矢量的坐标可以使用属性或下标来检索或设置。

trans-unit.source: The created callable tests for collision between two sprites, by testing to see if two circles centered on the sprites overlap, after scaling the circles radius by the stored ratio. If the sprites have a "radius" attribute, that is used to create the circle, otherwise a circle is created that is big enough to completely enclose the sprites rect as given by the "rect" attribute. Intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions. Sprites must have a "rect" and an optional "radius" attribute.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可调用测试两个精灵之间的碰撞,通过测试以精灵为中心的两个圆是否重叠,并通过存储的比例缩放圆的半径。如果精灵有 "radius "属性,则用来创建圆圈,否则创建一个足够大的圆圈,以完全包围由 "rect "属性给出的精灵矩形。打算作为碰撞回调函数传递给*collide函数。Sprites必须有一个 "rect "和一个可选的 "radius "属性。

trans-unit.source: The current algorithm searches the overlapping area in sizeof(unsigned long int) * CHAR_BIT bit wide column blocks (the value of sizeof(unsigned long int) * CHAR_BIT is platform dependent, for clarity it will be referred to as W). Starting at the top left corner it checks bits 0 to W - 1 of the first row ((0, 0) to (W - 1, 0)) then continues to the next row ((0, 1) to (W - 1, 1)). Once this entire column block is checked, it continues to the next one (W to 2 * W - 1). This is repeated until it finds a point of intersection or the entire overlapping area is checked.
trans-unit.target: 当前算法的搜索在重叠区域中 sizeof(unsigned long int) * CHAR_BIT 位宽列块（的值 sizeof(unsigned long int) * CHAR_BIT 是依赖于平台的，为了清楚起见，将被称为 W ）。从左上角开始，它检查第一行的位0到 W - 1 （ (0, 0) 到 (W - 1, 0) ），然后继续到下一行（ (0, 1) 到 (W - 1, 1) ）。一旦检查了整个列块，它就会继续到下一个（ W 到 2 * W - 1 ）。重复此操作，直到找到相交点或检查整个重叠区域为止。

trans-unit.source: The cursorfile and maskfile arguments can either be filenames or file-like object with the readlines method.
trans-unit.target: cursorfile和maskfile参数可以是文件名,也可以是readlines方法的类文件对象。

trans-unit.source: The default 'P' kind code does a direct raw integer pixel (mapped) value copy to a 2D array and a 'RGB' pixel component (unmapped) copy to a 3D array having shape (w, h, 3). For an 8 bit colormap surface this means the table index is copied to a 2D array, not the table value itself. A 2D array's item size must be at least as large as the surface's pixel byte size. The item size of a 3D array must be at least one byte.
trans-unit.target: 默认的'P'类代码会直接将原始整数像素(映射)值复制到一个二维数组,并将'RGB'像素分量(未映射)复制到一个具有形状(w,h,3)的三维数组。对于8位colormap曲面来说,这意味着表索引被复制到一个2D数组,而不是表值本身。二维数组的项目大小必须至少和曲面的像素字节大小一样大。三维数组的项目大小必须至少是一个字节。

trans-unit.source: The default Color length is 4. Colors can have lengths 1,2,3 or 4. This is useful if you want to unpack to r,g,b and not r,g,b,a. If you want to get the length of a Color do len(acolor).
trans-unit.target: The default Color length is 4. Colors can have lengths 1,2,3 or 4. This is useful if you want to unpack to r,g,b and not r,g,b,a. If you want to get the length of a Color do len(acolor) .

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method does nothing; it's just a convenient "hook" that you can override. This method is called by Group.update() with whatever arguments you give it.

trans-unit.source: The difference between the music playback and regular Sound playback is that the music is streamed, and never actually loaded all at once. The mixer system only supports a single music stream at once.
trans-unit.target: 音乐播放与普通Sound播放的区别在于,音乐是流媒体播放,而绝不是真正的一次性加载。混音器系统一次只支持一个音乐流。

trans-unit.target: 显示指数0表示使用默认显示。

trans-unit.target: 显示索引 0 表示使用默认显示。

trans-unit.source: The dokill argument is a bool. If set to True, all Sprites that collide will be removed from the Group.
trans-unit.target: dokill参数是一个bool。如果设置为True,所有碰撞的Sprites将从Group中移除。

trans-unit.source: The event queue contains pygame.event.EventType event objects. There are a variety of ways to access the queued events, from simply checking for the existence of events, to grabbing them directly off the stack. The event queue also offers some simple filtering which can slightly help performance by blocking certain event types from the queue. Use pygame.event.set_allowed() and pygame.event.set_blocked() to change this filtering. By default, all event types can be placed on the queue.
trans-unit.target: 事件队列包含 pygame.event.EventType 事件对象。有多种方法可以访问排队的事件，从简单地检查事件是否存在到直接将它们从堆栈中获取。事件队列还提供了一些简单的筛选，它可以通过阻止队列中的某些事件类型来稍微提高性能。使用 pygame.event.set_allowed() 和 pygame.event.set_blocked() 更改此过滤。默认情况下，所有事件类型都可以放在队列中。

trans-unit.source: The event queue gets pygame.KEYDOWN and pygame.KEYUP events when the keyboard buttons are pressed and released. Both events have a key attribute that is a integer ID representing every key on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 当按下并释放键盘按钮时，事件队列将获得 pygame.KEYDOWN 和 pygame.KEYUP 事件。这两个事件都有一个key属性，该属性是一个整数ID，代表键盘上的每个键。

trans-unit.source: The event queue has an upper limit on the number of events it can hold (128 for standard SDL 1.2). When the queue becomes full new events are quietly dropped. To prevent lost events, especially input events which signal a quit command, your program must handle events every frame (with pygame.event.get(), pygame.event.pump(), pygame.event.wait(), pygame.event.peek() or pygame.event.clear()) and process them. Not handling events may cause your system to decide your program has locked up. To speed up queue processing use pygame.event.set_blocked() to limit which events get queued.
trans-unit.target: 事件队列对其可容纳的事件数有上限（标准SDL 1.2为128）。当队列已满时，新事件将被静默删除。为了防止丢失事件，尤其是表示退出命令的输入事件，您的程序必须每帧处理一次事件（使用 pygame.event.get() ， pygame.event.pump() ， pygame.event.wait() ， pygame.event.peek() 或 pygame.event.clear() ）并处理它们。不处理事件可能会导致系统决定程序已锁定。为了加快队列处理速度，请使用 pygame.event.set_blocked() 限制要排队的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event queue has an upper limit on the number of events it can hold (128 for standard SDL 1.2). When the queue becomes full new events are quietly dropped. To prevent lost events, especially input events which signal a quit command, your program must regularly check for events and process them. To speed up queue processing use pygame.event.set_blocked() to limit which events get queued.
trans-unit.target: 事件队列对其可容纳的事件数有上限（标准SDL 1.2为128）。当队列变满时，新事件将静默删除。为了防止丢失事件，尤其是表示发出退出命令的输入事件，您的程序必须定期检查事件并进行处理。为了加快队列处理速度，请使用 pygame.event.set_blocked() 限制要排队的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event queue needs to be pumped frequently for some of the methods to work. So call one of pygame.event.get, pygame.event.wait, or pygame.event.pump regularly.
trans-unit.target: 事件队列需要频繁地被泵送,以使一些方法发挥作用。所以要定期调用 pygame.event.get、pygame.event.wait 或 pygame.event.pump 中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The event type identifier is in between the values of NOEVENT and NUMEVENTS. User defined events should have a value in the inclusive range of USEREVENT to NUMEVENTS - 1. It is recommended all user events follow this system.
trans-unit.target: 事件类型标识符在 NOEVENT 和 NUMEVENTS 的值之间。用户定义的事件的值应在 USEREVENT 到 NUMEVENTS - 1 范围内。建议所有用户事件都遵循此系统。

trans-unit.source: The event will be queued every time the music finishes, not just the first time. To stop the event from being queued, call this method with no argument.
trans-unit.target: 该事件将在每次音乐结束时排队,而不仅仅是第一次。要停止事件排队,请调用本方法时不使用参数。

trans-unit.source: The exporting object. It can be used to keep the parent object alive while its buffer is visible.
trans-unit.target: 输出对象。当父对象的缓冲区可见时,它可以用来保持父对象的活力。

trans-unit.source: The fade_ms argument will make the sound start playing at 0 volume and fade up to full volume over the time given. The sample may end before the fade-in is complete.
trans-unit.target: fade_ms参数将使声音从0音量开始播放,并在给定的时间内渐变到全音量。采样可能会在淡入完成之前结束。

trans-unit.source: The first point of collision between the masks is returned. The collision point is offset from sprite1's mask's topleft corner (which is always (0, 0)). The collision point is a position within the mask and is not related to the actual screen position of sprite1.
trans-unit.target: 返回蒙版之间的第一个碰撞点。碰撞点从 sprite1 的蒙版的左上角偏移（始终为（0，0））。碰撞点是蒙版内的位置，与 sprite1 的实际屏幕位置无关。

trans-unit.source: The font module allows for rendering TrueType fonts into a new Surface object. It accepts any UCS-2 character ('u0001' to 'uFFFF'). This module is optional and requires SDL_ttf as a dependency. You should test that pygame.font is available and initialized before attempting to use the module.

trans-unit.source: The groups are designed for high efficiency in removing and adding Sprites to them. They also allow cheap testing to see if a Sprite already exists in a Group. A given Sprite can exist in any number of groups. A game could use some groups to control object rendering, and a completely separate set of groups to control interaction or player movement. Instead of adding type attributes or bools to a derived Sprite class, consider keeping the Sprites inside organized Groups. This will allow for easier lookup later in the game.
trans-unit.target: 分组的设计是为了在删除和添加雪碧时有更高的效率。它们还允许廉价地测试一个雪碧是否已经存在于一个组中。一个给定的Sprite可以存在于任何数量的组中。一个游戏可以使用一些组来控制对象渲染,而完全独立的一组组来控制交互或玩家移动。与其在派生的Sprite类中添加类型属性或bool,不如考虑将Sprite保存在有组织的Group中。这样可以方便以后在游戏中查找。

trans-unit.source: The joystick module manages the joystick devices on a computer. Joystick devices include trackballs and video-game-style gamepads, and the module allows the use of multiple buttons and "hats". Computers may manage multiple joysticks at a time.
trans-unit.target: 操纵杆模块管理电脑上的操纵杆设备。操纵杆设备包括轨迹球和视频游戏风格的游戏手柄,该模块允许使用多个按钮和 "帽子"。计算机可以同时管理多个操纵杆。

[(minx, maxx, miny, maxy, advance), (minx, maxx, miny, maxy, advance), ...]. None is entered in the list for each unrecognized character.

trans-unit.source: The loops argument controls how many times the sample will be repeated after being played the first time. A value of 5 means that the sound will be played once, then repeated five times, and so is played a total of six times. The default value (zero) means the Sound is not repeated, and so is only played once. If loops is set to -1 the Sound will loop indefinitely (though you can still call stop() to stop it).
trans-unit.target: loops参数控制第一次播放后样本将重复多少次。值为5表示声音将被播放一次，然后重复播放五次，因此总共播放了六次。默认值（零）表示不重复播放声音，因此仅播放一次。如果将loops设置为-1，则Sound会无限循环（尽管您仍然可以调用 stop() 来停止它）。

trans-unit.source: The loops argument controls the number of repeats a music will play. play(5) will cause the music to played once, then repeated five times, for a total of six. If the loops is -1 then the music will repeat indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: loops参数控制音乐将播放的重复次数。 play(5) 将使音乐播放一次，然后重复播放五次，总共播放六次。如果循环为-1，则音乐将无限期重复。

trans-unit.source: The loops argument has the same meaning as in Sound.play(): it is the number of times to repeat the sound after the first time. If it is 3, the sound will be played 4 times (the first time, then three more). If loops is -1 then the playback will repeat indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: loops参数的含义与 Sound.play() 中的含义相同：这是第一次后重复声音的次数。如果为3，则声音将播放4次（第一次，然后再播放3次）。如果循环为-1，则播放将无限期重复。

trans-unit.source: The maxtime argument can be used to stop playback after a given number of milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: maxtime参数可以用来在给定的毫秒数之后停止播放。

trans-unit.source: The method can also return False for other reasons without the application being explicitly iconified or minimized by the user. A notable example being if the user has multiple virtual desktops and the display Surface is not on the active virtual desktop.
trans-unit.target: 该方法也可以因为其他原因返回False,而不需要用户明确地将应用程序图标化或最小化。一个明显的例子是,如果用户有多个虚拟桌面,而显示的Surface不在活动的虚拟桌面上。

trans-unit.source: The methods overlap(), overlap_area(), overlap_mask(), draw(), erase(), and convolve() use an offset parameter to indicate the offset of another mask's top left corner from the calling mask's top left corner. The calling mask's top left corner is considered to be the origin (0, 0). Offsets are a tuple or list of 2 integer values (x_offset, y_offset). Positive and negative offset values are supported.
trans-unit.target: 方法 overlap_area() overlap() ，overlay_area（）， overlap_mask() ， draw() ， erase() 和 convolve() 使用offset参数来指示另一个蒙版的左上角与调用蒙版的左上角的偏移量。呼叫掩码的左上角被认为是原点 (0, 0) 。偏移量是2个整数值 (x_offset, y_offset) 的元组或列表。支持正负偏移值。

trans-unit.source: The metrics are adjusted for the current rotation, strong, and oblique settings.
trans-unit.target: 对当前的旋转、强力、斜面设置进行指标调整。

trans-unit.source: The midi module can send output to midi devices and get input from midi devices. It can also list midi devices on the system.
trans-unit.target: midi模块可以向midi设备发送输出,也可以从midi设备获取输入。它还可以列出系统中的midi设备。

trans-unit.source: The midi module supports real and virtual midi devices.
trans-unit.target: midi模块支持真实和虚拟的midi设备。

trans-unit.source: The mixer also has a special streaming channel. This is for music playback and is accessed through the pygame.mixer.music module.
trans-unit.target: 混音器还具有特殊的流媒体频道。这用于音乐播放，可通过 pygame.mixer.music 模块进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The mixer can reserve any number of channels that will not be automatically selected for playback by Sounds. If sounds are currently playing on the reserved channels they will not be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 混音器可以保留任何数量的通道,这些通道不会被声音自动选择播放。如果声音正在被保留的通道上播放,它们将不会被停止。

trans-unit.source: The mixer module has a limited number of channels for playback of sounds. Usually programs tell pygame to start playing audio and it selects an available channel automatically. The default is 8 simultaneous channels, but complex programs can get more precise control over the number of channels and their use.
trans-unit.target: 混音器模块有有限的通道用于播放声音。通常程序告诉 pygame 开始播放音频,它会自动选择一个可用的通道。默认是8个通道同时播放,但复杂的程序可以更精确地控制通道的数量和使用。

trans-unit.source: The mixer module must be initialized like other pygame modules, but it has some extra conditions. The pygame.mixer.init() function takes several optional arguments to control the playback rate and sample size. Pygame will default to reasonable values, but pygame cannot perform Sound resampling, so the mixer should be initialized to match the values of your audio resources.
trans-unit.target: 混合器模块必须像其他pygame模块一样被初始化，但是它有一些额外的条件。所述 pygame.mixer.init() 函数需要几个可选参数来控制回放速率和样本大小。 Pygame将默认设置为合理的值，但是pygame无法执行声音重采样，因此应将混音器初始化为与音频资源的值匹配。

trans-unit.source: The modifier information is contained in the mod attribute of the pygame.KEYDOWN and pygame.KEYUP events. trans-unit.source: The most useful flags to pass will be pygame.HWSURFACE, pygame.DOUBLEBUF, and maybe pygame.FULLSCREEN. The function will return 0 if these display flags cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 要传递的最有用的标志是 pygame.HWSURFACE ， pygame.DOUBLEBUF 以及 pygame.FULLSCREEN 。如果无法设置这些显示标志，则该函数将返回0。

trans-unit.source: The mouse functions can be used to get the current state of the mouse device. These functions can also alter the system cursor for the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标功能可以用来获取鼠标设备的当前状态。这些功能还可以改变鼠标的系统光标。

trans-unit.source: The music module is closely tied to pygame.mixer. Use the music module to control the playback of music in the sound mixer.
trans-unit.target: 音乐模块与 pygame.mixer 紧密相关。使用音乐模块控制混音器中音乐的播放。

trans-unit.source: The new Surface will inherit the palette, color key, and alpha settings from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 新的Surface将继承其母公司的调色板、色键和alpha设置。

trans-unit.source: The new copy will have the same class as the copied surface. This lets as Surface subclass inherit this method without the need to override, unless subclass specific instance attributes also need copying.
trans-unit.target: 新的副本将与被复制的曲面具有相同的类。这让作为Surface子类继承这个方法而不需要覆盖,除非子类特定的实例属性也需要复制。

trans-unit.source: The new events of type pygame.WINDOWEVENT have an event attribute that can take the following values.
trans-unit.target: pygame.WINDOWEVENT 类型的新事件具有 event 属性，该属性可以采用以下值。

trans-unit.source: The next operation will be performed elementwise.
trans-unit.target: 接下来的操作将按元素进行。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds that passed between the previous two calls to Clock.tick().
trans-unit.target: 在前两次对 Clock.tick() 的调用之间经过的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels that are within the 'threshold' in 'surf' compared to either 'search_color' or
trans-unit.target: 与 "search_color "或 "surf "相比,"surf "中在 "阈值 "内的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first device with a substring that matches the string exactly is returned. For example, if the string in the registry is "USB" and device 1 is named "In USB MidiSport 1x1", then that will be the default input because it contains the string "USB".
trans-unit.target: 返回具有与字符串完全匹配的子串的第一个设备的编号。例如,如果注册表中的字符串是 "USB",而设备1被命名为 "In USB MidiSport 1x1",那么这将是默认的输入,因为它包含字符串 "USB"。

trans-unit.source: The number of valid bytes of data exported. For discontinuous data, that is data which is not a single block of memory, the bytes within the gaps are excluded from the count. This property is equivalent to the Py_buffer C struct len field.
trans-unit.target: 导出的有效数据字节数。对于不连续的数据，即不是单个内存块的数据，间隙内的字节将从计数中排除。此属性等效于 Py_buffer C struct len 字段。

trans-unit.source: The oblique style is only supported for scalable (outline) fonts. An attempt to set this style on a bitmap font will raise an AttributeError. If the font object is inactive, as returned by Font.__new__(), setting this property raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 仅可缩放（轮廓）字体支持倾斜样式。尝试在位图字体上设置此样式将引发AttributeError。如果Font对象是非活动的（如 Font.__new__() 返回的那样），则设置此属性将引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: The optional resolution argument sets the pixel size, in dots per inch, for use in scaling glyphs for this Font instance. If 0 then the default module value, set by init(), is used. The Font object's resolution can only be changed by re-initializing the Font instance.
trans-unit.target: 可选的resolution参数设置像素大小，以每英寸点数为单位，用于缩放此Font实例的字形。如果为0 ，则使用由 init() 设置的默认模块值。只能通过重新初始化Font实例来更改Font对象的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The optional ucs4 argument, an integer, sets the default text translation mode: 0 (False) recognize UTF-16 surrogate pairs, any other value (True), to treat Unicode text as UCS-4, with no surrogate pairs. See Font.ucs4.
trans-unit.target: 可选的ucs4参数（整数）设置默认的文本转换模式：0（False）识别UTF-16代理对，任何其他值（True），将没有代理对的Unicode文本视为UCS-4。参见 Font.ucs4 。

trans-unit.source: The optional flags argument can be set to pygame.RLEACCEL to provide better performance on non accelerated displays. An RLEACCEL Surface will be slower to modify, but quicker to blit as a source.
trans-unit.target: 可选的flags参数可以设置为 pygame.RLEACCEL ,以在非加速显示上提供更好的性能。 RLEACCEL 曲面的修改速度较慢，但​​将其作为源进行渲染的速度更快。

trans-unit.source: The origin of the display, where x = 0 and y = 0, is the top left of the screen. Both axes increase positively towards the bottom right of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示的原点,其中x=0,y=0,是屏幕的左上方。两个轴都向屏幕右下角正向增加。

trans-unit.source: The output example shows how to translate mouse clicks or computer keyboard events into midi notes. It implements a rudimentary button widget and state machine.
trans-unit.target: 该输出示例展示了如何将鼠标点击或计算机键盘事件转化为midi音符。它实现了一个基本的按钮部件和状态机。

trans-unit.source: The overlay objects are always visible, and always show above the regular display contents.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖对象总是可见的,并且总是显示在常规显示内容之上。

trans-unit.source: The physical buffer start address and a read-only flag as a length 2 tuple. The address is an integer value, while the read-only flag is a bool—False for writable, True for read-only.
trans-unit.target: 物理缓冲区的起始地址和一个只读标志（长度为2个元组）。地址是一个整数值，而只读标志是bool- False 可写， True 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format can be controlled by passing the bit depth or an existing Surface. The flags argument is a bitmask of additional features for the surface. You can pass any combination of these flags:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过传递位元深度或现有的曲面来控制像素格式。标志参数是曲面的附加特征的位掩码。您可以传递这些标志的任意组合。

trans-unit.source: The points along the line ((1, 1), (4, 2.5)) would be (2, 1.5) and (3, 2) and would cover 50% of the pixel (2, 1), 50% of the pixel (2, 2) and 100% of the pixel (3, 2).
trans-unit.target: 沿线 ((1, 1), (4, 2.5)) 的点将是 (2, 1.5) 和 (3, 2) 并且将覆盖像素 (2, 1) 50％，像素的50％ (2, 2) 和像素 (3, 2) ）的100％。

trans-unit.source: The points along the line ((1.2, 1.4), (4.6, 3.1)) would be (2, 1.8) (covering 20% of the pixel (2, 1) and 80% of the pixel (2, 2)), (3, 2.3) (covering 70% of the pixel (3, 2) and 30% of the pixel (3, 3)) and (4, 2.8) (covering 20% of the pixel (2, 1) and 80% of the pixel (2, 2))
trans-unit.target: 沿线的点 ((1.2, 1.4), (4.6, 3.1)) 将是 (2, 1.8) （覆盖的像素的20％的 (2, 1) 的像素的和80％的 (2, 2) ）， (3, 2.3) 覆盖像素的70％ (3, 2) 和象素的30％的 (3, 3) ）和 (4, 2.8) （覆盖的像素的20％的 (2, 1) 和80％的像素 (2, 2) ）的

trans-unit.source: The pygame display can actually be initialized in one of several modes. By default, the display is a basic software driven framebuffer. You can request special modules like hardware acceleration and OpenGL support. These are controlled by flags passed to pygame.display.set_mode().
trans-unit.target: pygame显示实际上可以在几种模式之一中初始化。默认情况下，显示是基本的软件驱动的帧缓冲区。您可以请求特殊模块，例如硬件加速和OpenGL支持。这些由传递给 pygame.display.set_mode() 的标志控制。

trans-unit.source: The pygame math module currently provides Vector classes in two and three dimensions, Vector2 and Vector3 respectively.
trans-unit.target: pygame数学模块当前提供二维和三个维度的Vector类，分别为 Vector2 和 Vector3 。

trans-unit.source: The pygame math module currently provides Vector classes in two and three dimensions, Vector2 and Vector3 respectively.
trans-unit.target: pygame数学模块目前提供了二维和三维的Vector类,分别是Vector2和Vector3。

trans-unit.source: The pygame package does not import freetype automatically when loaded. This module must be imported explicitly to be used.
trans-unit.target: pygame软件包在加载时不会自动导入 freetype 。必须明确导入此模块才能使用。

trans-unit.source: The pygame package does not import gfxdraw automatically when loaded, so it must imported explicitly to be used.
trans-unit.target: pygame包在加载时不会自动导入gfxdraw,所以必须显式导入才能使用。

trans-unit.source: The pygame package represents the top-level package for others to use. Pygame itself is broken into many submodules, but this does not affect programs that use pygame.
trans-unit.target: pygame包代表了顶级包,供他人使用。Pygame本身被分解成许多子模块,但这并不影响使用pygame的程序。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.gfxdraw module differs from the draw module in the API it uses, and also the different functions available to draw. It also wraps the primitives from the library called SDL_gfx, rather than using modified versions.
trans-unit.target: pygame.gfxdraw 模块与 draw 模块的不同之处在于它所使用的 API,以及可用于绘制的不同函数。它还封装了名为SDL_gfx的库中的基元,而不是使用修改后的版本。

trans-unit.source: The red value of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的红色值。

trans-unit.source: The return rectangle is the area of the affected pixels, excluding any pixels outside the destination Surface, or outside the clipping area.
trans-unit.target: 返回的矩形是受影响像素的区域,不包括目标Surface之外的任何像素,或剪裁区域之外的像素。

trans-unit.source: The return value cursor_args can be passed directly to the pygame.mouse.set_cursor() function.
trans-unit.target: 返回值cursor_args可以直接传递给 pygame.mouse.set_cursor() 函数。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a pygame.Rect() giving the size and position of the rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是 pygame.Rect() ,它提供了呈现文本的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a rectangle giving the size and position of the rendered text within the surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个矩形,给出了渲染文字在表面的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a tuple: the new surface and the bounding rectangle giving the size and origin of the rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个元组:新的曲面和边界矩形,给出渲染文本的大小和原点。

trans-unit.source: The returned Rect list should be passed to pygame.display.update(). This will help performance on software driven display modes. This type of updating is usually only helpful on destinations with non-animating backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Rect列表应传递给 pygame.display.update() 。这将有助于软件驱动的显示模式下的性能。此类更新通常仅对具有非动画背景的目标有用。

trans-unit.source: The returned Surface will contain the same color format, colorkey and alpha transparency as the file it came from. You will often want to call Surface.convert() with no arguments, to create a copy that will draw more quickly on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Surface将包含与其来源的文件相同的颜色格式，colorkey和alpha透明度。您通常会希望不带任何参数调用 Surface.convert() ，以创建一个副本，以便在屏幕上更快地绘制。

trans-unit.source: The same as the Rect.unionall() method, but operates in place.
trans-unit.target: 与 Rect.unionall() 方法相同，但在适当位置运行。

trans-unit.target: Scrap模块目前只支持Windows、X11和Mac OS X。在Mac OS X上,目前只支持文本,其他类型的文本可能会在未来的版本中被支持。

trans-unit.source: The scrap module is for transferring data to/from the clipboard. This allows for cutting and pasting data between pygame and other applications. Some basic data (MIME) types are defined and registered:
trans-unit.target: 剪贴板模块用于向剪贴板传输数据。这允许在pygame和其他应用程序之间剪切和粘贴数据。一些基本的数据(MIME)类型被定义和注册。

trans-unit.source: The scrap module requires pygame.display.set_mode() be called before being initialized.
trans-unit.target: scrap模块需要在初始化之前调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 。

trans-unit.source: The size and format image must compute the exact same size as the passed string buffer. Otherwise an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 大小和格式图像必须计算出与传递的字符串缓冲区完全相同的大小。否则将引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: The size argument is a pair of numbers representing the width and height. The flags argument is a collection of additional options. The depth argument represents the number of bits to use for color.
trans-unit.target: 大小参数是一对数字,代表宽度和高度。标志参数是一个附加选项的集合。深度参数代表用于颜色的位数。

trans-unit.source: The size argument represents how many bits are used for each audio sample. If the value is negative then signed sample values will be used. Positive values mean unsigned audio samples will be used. An invalid value raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 大小参数表示每个音频样本使用多少位。如果该值为负数,那么将使用有符号的样本值。正值意味着将使用无符号音频样本。无效的值会引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the exported buffer.
trans-unit.target: 输出缓冲区的大小,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The starting address of the surface's raw pixel bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表面的原始像素字节的起始地址。

trans-unit.source: The starting position argument controls where in the music the song starts playing. The starting position is dependent on the format of music playing. MP3 and OGG use the position as time (in seconds). MOD music it is the pattern order number. Passing a startpos will raise a NotImplementedError if it cannot set the start position
trans-unit.target: 开始位置参数控制歌曲在音乐中开始播放的位置。起始位置取决于音乐播放的格式。 MP3 和 OGG 使用位置作为时间（以秒为单位）。 MOD 音乐是图案订单号。如果无法设置起始位置，则传递startpos会引发NotImplementedError

trans-unit.source: The state of the font's oblique style flag
trans-unit.target: 字体的斜体标志的状态。

trans-unit.target: 字体的强势风格标志的状态。

trans-unit.target: 字体的下划线样式标志的状态。

trans-unit.target: 字体的宽体旗帜的状态。

trans-unit.target: 与强势或宽体字风格相关的强度。

trans-unit.source: The strength style is only supported for scalable (outline) fonts. An attempt to set this property on a bitmap font will raise an AttributeError. If the font object is inactive, as returned by Font.__new__(), assignment to this property raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 仅可缩放（轮廓）字体支持强度样式。尝试在位图字体上设置此属性将引发AttributeError。如果Font对象是非活动的（如 Font.__new__() 返回的那样），则对此属性的赋值将引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: The strings are not validated, and improperly sized strings could crash the program.
trans-unit.target: 字符串未被验证,大小不合适的字符串可能会使程序崩溃。

trans-unit.source: The surface is locked only when an exposed interface is accessed. For new buffer interface accesses, the surface is unlocked once the last buffer view is released. For array interface and old buffer interface accesses, the surface remains locked until the BufferProxy object is released.
trans-unit.target: 只有在访问暴露的接口时,表面才会被锁定。对于新的缓冲区接口访问,一旦最后一个缓冲区视图被释放,表面就会被解锁。对于数组接口和旧缓冲区接口的访问,表面一直保持锁定状态,直到BufferProxy对象被释放。

trans-unit.source: The surface_to_array function copies pixels from a Surface object to a 2D or 3D array. Depending on argument kind and the target array dimension, a copy may be raw pixel value, RGB, a color component slice, or colorkey alpha transparency value. Recognized kind values are the single character codes 'P', 'R', 'G', 'B', 'A', and 'C'. Kind codes are case insensitive, so 'p' is equivalent to 'P'. The first two dimensions of the target must be the surface size (w, h).
trans-unit.target: surface_to_array函数将像素从Surface对象复制到2D或3D数组。根据参数 kind 和目标数组尺寸，副本可以是原始像素值，RGB，颜色分量切片或colorkey alpha透明度值。公认的 kind 值是单个字符代码“ P”，“ R”，“ G”，“ B”，“ A”和“ C”。种类代码不区分大小写，因此“ p”等效于“ P”。目标的前两个尺寸必须是表面尺寸（w，h）。

trans-unit.source: The text can only be a single line: newline characters are not rendered. Null characters ('x00') raise a TypeError. Both Unicode and char (byte) strings are accepted. For Unicode strings only UCS-2 characters ('u0001' to 'uFFFF') are recognized. Anything greater raises a UnicodeError. For char strings a LATIN1 encoding is assumed. The antialias argument is a boolean: if true the characters will have smooth edges. The color argument is the color of the text [e.g.: (0,0,255) for blue]. The optional background argument is a color to use for the text background. If no background is passed the area outside the text will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 文本只能是一行：不显示换行符。空字符（'x00'）引发TypeError。Unicode和char（字节）字符串都可以接受。对于Unicode字符串，只能识别UCS-2字符（“ u0001”至“ uFFFF”）。任何更大的值都会引发UnicodeError。对于char字符串，假定为 LATIN1 编码。antialias参数是一个布尔值：如果为true，则字符将具有平滑的边缘。color参数是文本的颜色[例如：（0,0,255）为蓝色]。可选的背景参数是用于文本背景的颜色。如果没有背景通过，则文本外部的区域将是透明的。

trans-unit.source: The time is reset to 0 when the pygame.midi module is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 pygame.midi 模块时，该时间将重置为0 。

trans-unit.source: The two angle arguments are given in degrees and indicate the start and stop positions of the arc. The arc is drawn in a clockwise direction from the start_angle to the stop_angle. If start_angle == stop_angle, nothing will be drawn
trans-unit.target: 两个角度自变量以度为单位给出，它们指示圆弧的起始和终止位置。从 start_angle 到 stop_angle 沿顺时针方向绘制弧。如果 start_angle == stop_angle ，则不会绘制任何内容

trans-unit.source: The two angle arguments are given in degrees and indicate the start and stop positions of the pie. The pie is drawn in a clockwise direction from the start_angle to the stop_angle. If start_angle == stop_angle, a straight line will be drawn from the center position at the given angle, to a length of the radius.
trans-unit.target: 两个角度参数以度为单位给出，并指示饼图​​的开始和停止位置。从 start_angle 到 stop_angle 沿顺时针方向绘制饼图。如果 start_angle == stop_angle ，将从中心位置以给定角度绘制一条直线，直到半径的长度。

trans-unit.source: The two angle arguments are given in radians and indicate the start and stop positions of the arc. The arc is drawn in a counterclockwise direction from the start_angle to the stop_angle.
trans-unit.target: 两个角度自变量以弧度表示，指示圆弧的开始和停止位置。弧从 start_angle 到 stop_angle 沿逆时针方向绘制。

trans-unit.source: The type argument will be the event id sent to the queue. This can be any valid event type, but a good choice would be a value between pygame.locals.USEREVENT and pygame.locals.NUMEVENTS. If no type argument is given then the Channel will stop sending endevents.
trans-unit.target: type参数将是发送到队列的事件ID。这可以是任何有效的事件类型，但是最好的选择是 pygame.locals.USEREVENT 和 pygame.locals.NUMEVENTS 之间的值。如果未提供类型参数，则Channel将停止发送结束事件。

trans-unit.source: There are important things that must be dealt with internally in the event queue. The main window may need to be repainted or respond to the system. If you fail to make a call to the event queue for too long, the system may decide your program has locked up.
trans-unit.target: 在事件队列中,有一些重要的事情必须在内部处理。主窗口可能需要重新绘制或响应系统。如果你太久没有对事件队列进行调用,系统可能会判定你的程序已经锁定。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to run the examples. First they can be run as stand-alone programs. Second they can be imported and their main() methods called (see below). Finally, the easiest way is to use the python -m option:
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以运行示例。首先，它们可以作为独立程序运行。其次，可以导入它们并调用其 main() 方法（请参见下文）。最后，最简单的方法是使用python -m选项：

trans-unit.source: There are three types of transparency supported in pygame: colorkeys, surface alphas, and pixel alphas. Surface alphas can be mixed with colorkeys, but an image with per pixel alphas cannot use the other modes. Colorkey transparency makes a single color value transparent. Any pixels matching the colorkey will not be drawn. The surface alpha value is a single value that changes the transparency for the entire image. A surface alpha of 255 is opaque, and a value of 0 is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: pygame中支持的透明度有三种:colorkeys、surface alphass和pixel alphass。Surface alphass可以和colorkeys混合使用,但使用per pixel alphass的图像不能使用其他模式。colorkey透明度可以使一个颜色值透明。任何与颜色键匹配的像素都不会被绘制。表面alpha值是改变整个图像透明度的单一值。表面阿尔法值为255则不透明,值为0则完全透明。

trans-unit.source: There is a special property, GroupSingle.sprite, that accesses the Sprite that this Group contains. It can be None when the Group is empty. The property can also be assigned to add a Sprite into the GroupSingle container.
trans-unit.target: 有一个特殊属性 GroupSingle.sprite ，用于访问该Group包含的Sprite。当组为空时，可以为无。还可以分配该属性以将Sprite添加到GroupSingle容器中。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to use this method if not using the convenience method by the same name in the Group class.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用Group类中同名的方便方法,就没有必要使用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no way to get the return value from the Sprite.update() methods.
trans-unit.target: 无法从 Sprite.update() 方法获取返回值。

trans-unit.source: There is proper functionality for mouse wheel behaviour with pygame 2 supporting pygame.MOUSEWHEEL events. The new events support horizontal and vertical scroll movements, with signed integer values representing the amount scrolled (x and y), as well as flipped direction (the set positive and negative values for each axis is flipped). Read more about SDL2 input-related changes here https://wiki.libsdl.org/MigrationGuide#Input
trans-unit.target: pygame 2支持 pygame.MOUSEWHEEL 事件，具有鼠标滚轮行为的适当功能。新事件支持水平和垂直滚动运动，其中带符号的整数值表示滚动量（ x 和 y ）以及 flipped 方向（每个轴的设置的正值和负值都翻转）。在此处阅读有关SDL2输入相关更改的更多信息https://wiki.libsdl.org/MigrationGuide#Input

trans-unit.source: There is support for pixel access for the Surfaces. Pixel access on hardware surfaces is slow and not recommended. Pixels can be accessed using the get_at() and set_at() functions. These methods are fine for simple access, but will be considerably slow when doing of pixel work with them. If you plan on doing a lot of pixel level work, it is recommended to use a pygame.PixelArray, which gives an array like view of the surface. For involved mathematical manipulations try the pygame.surfarray module (It's quite quick, but requires NumPy.)
trans-unit.target: 支持对Surface的像素访问。硬件表面上的像素访问很慢，因此不建议这样做。可以使用 get_at() 和 set_at() 函数访问像素。这些方法适合简单访问，但是与它们一起进行像素处理时会非常慢。如果您打算做很多像素级的工作，建议使用 pygame.PixelArray ，它可以提供类似于表面视图的阵列。对于涉及的数学操作，请尝试 pygame.surfarray 模块（这非常快，但是需要NumPy。）

trans-unit.source: There may be a brief pause while the drive is initialized. Avoid CD.init() if the program should not stop for a second or two.
trans-unit.target: 初始化驱动器时可能会有短暂的暂停。如果程序不应停止一两秒钟，请避免使用 CD.init() 。

trans-unit.source: These are pygame events (pygame.event) reserved for midi use. The MIDIIN event is used by pygame.midi.midis2events() when converting midi events to pygame events.
trans-unit.target: 这些是为MIDI使用保留的pygame事件（ pygame.event ）。所述 MIDIIN 事件是由所使用 pygame.midi.midis2events() 转换MIDI事件到事件pygame的时。

trans-unit.source: These constants may be found on the FreeType constants module. Optionally, the default style can be modified or obtained accessing the individual style attributes (underline, oblique, strong).
trans-unit.target: 这些常量可以在FreeType常量模块中找到。可以选择修改默认样式,或者通过访问单个样式属性(下划线、斜线、强)获得默认样式。

trans-unit.source: These examples should help get you started with pygame. Here is a brief rundown of what you get. The source code for these examples is in the public domain. Feel free to use for your own projects.
trans-unit.target: 这些例子应该可以帮助你开始使用pygame。下面是一个简单的概述。这些例子的源代码是在公共领域。欢迎在你自己的项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: These functions temporarily lock the surface they are operating on. Many sequential drawing calls can be sped up by locking and unlocking the surface object around the draw calls (see pygame.Surface.lock() and pygame.Surface.unlock()).
trans-unit.target: 这些功能会暂时锁定正在操作的表面。通过锁定和解锁绘制调用周围的表面对象，可以加快许多顺序的绘制调用的速度（请参阅 pygame.Surface.lock() 和 pygame.Surface.unlock() ）。

trans-unit.source: These variables are defined by SDL.
trans-unit.target: 这些变量由SDL定义。

trans-unit.source: These variables are defined by pygame itself.
trans-unit.target: 这些变量由 pygame 自己定义。

trans-unit.source: They support the following numerical operations: vec+vec, vec-vec, vec*number, number*vec, vec/number, vec//number, vec+=vec, vec-=vec, vec*=number, vec/=number, vec//=number.
trans-unit.target: 它们支持以下数值运算： vec+vec ， vec-vec ， vec*number ， number*vec ， vec/number ， vec//number ， vec+=vec ， vec-=vec ， vec*=number ， vec/=number ， vec//=number 。

trans-unit.source: They support the following numerical operations: vec+vec, vec-vec, vec*number, number*vec, vec/number, vec//number, vec+=vec, vec-=vec, vec*=number, vec/=number, vec//=number. All these operations will be performed elementwise. In addition vec*vec will perform a scalar-product (a.k.a. dot-product). If you want to multiply every element from vector v with every element from vector w you can use the elementwise method: v.elementwise() * w
trans-unit.target: 它们支持以下数值运算：vec + vec，vec-vec，vec * number，number * vec，vec / number，vec // number，vec + = vec，vec- = vec，vec * = number，vec / = number ，vec // =数字。所有这些操作将按元素进行。另外，vec * vec将执行标量积（aka点积）。如果要将向量v中的每个元素与向量w中的每个元素相乘，可以使用elementwise方法： v.elementwise() * w

trans-unit.source: This pygame.masks demo will display multiple moving sprites bouncing off each other. More than one sprite image can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 这个 pygame.masks 演示将显示多个移动的精灵，它们会相互反弹。可以提供一个以上的子画面图像。

trans-unit.source: This allows control over the placement of the pygame window within the display. Must be set before calling pygame.display.set_mode().
trans-unit.target: 这样可以控制pygame窗口在显示器内的放置。必须在调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 之前进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This allows the application to reserve a specific number of channels for important sounds that must not be dropped or have a guaranteed channel to play on.
trans-unit.target: 这允许应用程序为重要的声音保留特定数量的通道,不得丢弃或有保证的通道播放。

trans-unit.source: This call cannot be used on pygame.OPENGL displays and will generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: 该调用不能在 pygame.OPENGL 显示上使用，并且会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful for collision detection. An approximate collision normal can be found by calculating the gradient of the overlapping area through the finite difference.
trans-unit.target: 这对碰撞检测很有用。通过有限差值计算重叠区域的梯度,可以找到一个近似的碰撞法线。

trans-unit.source: This can flip a Surface either vertically, horizontally, or both. Flipping a Surface is non-destructive and returns a new Surface with the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可以垂直、水平或同时翻转一个曲面。翻转曲面是非破坏性的,并返回一个具有相同尺寸的新曲面。

trans-unit.source: This can only work on 24-bit or 32-bit Surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这只适用于24位或32位的Surface。

trans-unit.source: This can only work on 32-bit Surfaces with a per-pixel alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 这只能在32位的Surface上使用每像素的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: This causes pygame to signal (by means of the event queue) when the music is done playing. The argument determines the type of event that will be queued.
trans-unit.target: 这将使 pygame 在音乐播放完毕时发出信号(通过事件队列)。参数决定将被排队的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: This class derives from pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates(). It maintains the order in which the Sprites were added to the Group for rendering. This makes adding and removing Sprites from the Group a little slower than regular Groups.
trans-unit.target: 此类从 pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates() 派生。它保持将精灵添加到组以进行渲染的顺序。这使得从组中添加和删除Sprite的速度比常规组慢一些。

trans-unit.source: This class is an alias to pygame.sprite.Group(). It has no additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此类是 pygame.sprite.Group() 的别名。它没有其他功能。

trans-unit.source: This class is derived from pygame.sprite.Group(). It has an extended draw() method that tracks the changed areas of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 此类从 pygame.sprite.Group() 派生。它具有扩展的 draw() 方法，该方法可跟踪屏幕的更改区域。

trans-unit.source: This closes resources like files for any music that may be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 这将关闭任何可能加载的音乐文件等资源。

trans-unit.source: This creates a new Surface with the specified text rendered on it. pygame provides no way to directly draw text on an existing Surface: instead you must use Font.render() to create an image (Surface) of the text, then blit this image onto another Surface.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个新的Surface，上面带有指定的文本。pygame没有提供直接在现有Surface上绘制文本的方法：相反，您必须使用 Font.render() 创建文本的图像（Surface），然后将此图像着色到另一个Surface上。

trans-unit.source: This cursors module contains functions for loading and decoding various cursor formats. These allow you to easily store your cursors in external files or directly as encoded python strings.
trans-unit.target: cursors模块包含了加载和解码各种游标格式的功能。这些函数允许你轻松地将游标存储在外部文件中,或者直接作为编码的python字符串。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a scrollable image that has a zoom factor of eight. It uses the Surface.scroll() function to shift the image on the display surface. A clip rectangle protects a margin area. If called as a function, the example accepts an optional image file path. If run as a program it takes an optional file path command line argument. If no file is provided a default image file is used.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了缩放系数为8的可滚动图像。它使用 Surface.scroll() 函数在显示表面上移动图像。剪辑矩形保护边缘区域。如果作为函数调用，则该示例接受可选的图像文件路径。如果作为程序运行，它将采用可选的文件路径命令行参数。如果未提供文件，则使用默认图像文件。

trans-unit.source: This example was created in a quick comparison with the BlitzBasic gaming language. Nonetheless, it demonstrates a quick 8-bit setup (with colormap).
trans-unit.target: 这个例子是在与BlitzBasic游戏语言的快速比较中创建的。尽管如此,它还是演示了一个快速的8位设置(带colormap)。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised whenever a pygame or SDL operation fails. You can catch any anticipated problems and deal with the error. The exception is always raised with a descriptive message about the problem.
trans-unit.target: 每当 pygame 或 SDL 操作失败时,就会引发这个异常。你可以抓住任何预期的问题并处理错误。异常的发生总是带有关于问题的描述性信息。

trans-unit.source: This forces set_mode() to use the SCALED display mode and, if "photo" is set, makes the scaling use the slowest, but highest quality anisotropic scaling algorithm, if it is available. Must be set before calling pygame.display.set_mode().
trans-unit.target: 这将强制set_mode（）使用SCALED显示模式，如果设置了“照片”，则使缩放使用最慢但质量最高的各向异性缩放算法（如果可用）。必须在调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 之前进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This function can only be called once per Python session. It is not reentrant.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在每个 Python 会话中只能被调用一次。它不是重入式的。

trans-unit.source: This function closes the freetype module. After calling this function, you should not invoke any class, method or function related to the freetype module as they are likely to fail or might give unpredictable results. It is safe to call this function even if the module hasn't been initialized yet.
trans-unit.target: 此功能关闭 freetype 模块。调用此函数后，您不应调用与 freetype 模块相关的任何类，方法或函数，因为它们可能会失败或可能产生不可预测的结果。即使模块尚未初始化，也可以安全地调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function has no effect on a Surface with more than 8-bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 此功能对每个像素超过8位的Surface没有影响。

trans-unit.source: This function initializes the underlying FreeType library and must be called before trying to use any of the functionality of the freetype module.
trans-unit.target: 此函数初始化基础的FreeType库，并且在尝试使用 freetype 模块的任何功能之前必须先调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called automatically by pygame.init().
trans-unit.target: pygame.init() 自动调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the group collide functions (see spritecollide(), groupcollide(), spritecollideany()).
trans-unit.target: 此函数旨在作为 collided 回调函数传递给group collide函数（请参见 spritecollide() ， groupcollide() ， spritecollideany() ）。

trans-unit.source: This function is like an optimized version of pygame.display.flip() for software displays. It allows only a portion of the screen to updated, instead of the entire area. If no argument is passed it updates the entire Surface area like pygame.display.flip().
trans-unit.target: 此功能类似于 pygame.display.flip() 的软件显示的优化版本。它仅允许屏幕的一部分进行更新，而不是整个区域。如果未传递任何参数，则它将更新整个Surface区域，如 pygame.display.flip() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is not necessary if your program is consistently processing events on the queue through the other pygame.event functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的程序通过其他 pygame.event 函数持续处理队列中的事件，则不需要此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is not necessary if your program is consistently processing events on the queue through the other pygame.fastevent functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的程序通过其他 pygame.fastevent 函数持续处理队列中的事件，则不需要此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for pygame testing and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于pygame的测试和调试。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for pygame testing and debugging. If smoothscale causes an invalid instruction error then it is a pygame/SDL bug that should be reported. Use this function as a temporary fix only.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是为了pygame测试和调试而提供的。如果 smoothscale 导致无效指令错误,那么这是一个 pygame/SDL 错误,应该被报告。仅将此函数用作临时修复。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to pygame.image.load(), except that this function can only be used if pygame was built with extended image format support.
trans-unit.target: 该函数类似于 pygame.image.load() ，不同之处在于，仅当pygame是使用扩展的图像格式支持构建的时，才能使用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is used in encoding file paths. Keyword arguments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于对文件路径进行编码。支持关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to create the masks for pygame.sprite.collide_mask().
trans-unit.target: 此函数用于为 pygame.sprite.collide_mask() 创建掩码。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to encode file paths in pygame. Encoding is to the codec as returned by sys.getfilesystemencoding(). Keyword arguments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 此函数用于在pygame中编码文件路径。编码是 sys.getfilesystemencoding() 返回的编解码器。支持关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: This function only supports loading "basic" image format, ie BMP format. This function is always available, no matter how pygame was built.
trans-unit.target: 此功能仅支持加载“基本”图像格式，即 BMP 格式。无论pygame如何构建，此功能始终可用。

trans-unit.source: This function returning True is unrelated to whether the application has input focus. Please see pygame.key.get_focused() and pygame.mouse.get_focused() for APIs related to input focus.
trans-unit.target: 返回True的此函数与应用程序是否具有输入焦点无关。请参阅 pygame.key.get_focused() 和 pygame.mouse.get_focused() 了解与输入焦点相关的API。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a list of possible sizes for a specified color depth. The return value will be an empty list if no display modes are available with the given arguments. A return value of -1 means that any requested size should work (this is likely the case for windowed modes). Mode sizes are sorted from biggest to smallest.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回一个指定颜色深度的可能尺寸列表,如果给定参数中没有可用的显示模式,则返回值为空。如果给定的参数中没有可用的显示模式,则返回值将是一个空列表。返回值为-1表示任何要求的尺寸都可以使用(这可能是窗口模式的情况)。模式的大小是按照从大到小的顺序排列的。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a list of possible sizes for a specified color depth. The return value will be an empty list if no display modes are available with the given arguments. A return value of -1 means that any requested size should work (this is likely the case for windowed modes). Mode sizes are sorted from biggest to smallest.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回指定颜色深度的可能尺寸的列表。如果给定参数没有可用的显示模式，则返回值将为空列表。返回值 -1 表示任何请求的大小都应该起作用（窗口模式可能就是这种情况）。模式大小从最大到最小排序。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be called in the thread that initialized pygame.display.
trans-unit.target: 仅应在初始化 pygame.display 的线程中调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function takes arguments similar to pygame.image.tostring(). The size argument is a pair of numbers representing the width and height. Once the new Surface is created you can destroy the string buffer.
trans-unit.target: 该函数采用类似于 pygame.image.tostring() 的参数。size参数是一对数字，代表宽度和高度。一旦创建了新的Surface，就可以销毁字符串缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This function uses degrees while the pygame.draw.arc() function uses radians.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用度，而 pygame.draw.arc() 函数使用弧度。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the same arguments as pygame.display.set_mode(). It is used to determine if a requested display mode is available. It will return 0 if the display mode cannot be set. Otherwise it will return a pixel depth that best matches the display asked for.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用与 pygame.display.set_mode() 相同的参数。它用于确定请求的显示模式是否可用。如果无法设置显示模式，它将返回0。否则，它将返回最匹配显示要求的像素深度。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the same arguments as pygame.display.set_mode(). It is used to determine if a requested display mode is available. It will return 0 if the display mode cannot be set. Otherwise it will return a pixel depth that best matches the display asked for.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用与 pygame.display.set_mode() 相同的参数。它用于确定请求的显示模式是否可用。如果无法设置显示模式，它将返回 0 。否则，它将返回最匹配显示要求的像素深度。

trans-unit.source: This function will create a display Surface. The arguments passed in are requests for a display type. The actual created display will be the best possible match supported by the system.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将创建一个显示Surface。传入的参数是对显示类型的请求。实际创建的显示类型将是系统支持的最佳匹配。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock and unlock the Surface as needed.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将根据需要临时锁定和解锁Surface。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as pixels are copied (see the pygame.Surface.lock() - lock the Surface memory for pixel access method).
trans-unit.target: 复制像素时，此函数将临时锁定Surface（请参见 pygame.Surface.lock() -锁定Surface内存以进行像素访问方法）。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as pixels are copied.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将在复制像素时暂时锁定Surface。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as the new values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将在复制新值时暂时锁定Surface。

trans-unit.source: This gets the number of milliseconds that the music has been playing for. The returned time only represents how long the music has been playing; it does not take into account any starting position offsets.
trans-unit.target: 获取音乐播放的毫秒数。返回的时间只代表音乐播放的时间,不考虑任何起始位置的偏移。

trans-unit.source: This group is fully compatible with pygame.sprite.Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 该组与 pygame.sprite.Sprite 完全兼容。

trans-unit.source: This group requires pygame.sprite.DirtySprite or any sprite that has the following attributes:
trans-unit.target: 该组需要 pygame.sprite.DirtySprite 或具有以下属性的任何sprite：

trans-unit.source: This is a combined scale and rotation transform. The resulting Surface will be a filtered 32-bit Surface. The scale argument is a floating point value that will be multiplied by the current resolution. The angle argument is a floating point value that represents the counterclockwise degrees to rotate. A negative rotation angle will rotate clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个结合了缩放和旋转的变换。得到的Surface是一个过滤后的32位Surface。刻度参数是一个浮点数,将乘以当前的分辨率。角度参数是一个浮点值,代表要旋转的逆时针度数。负的旋转角度将顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: This is a more featureful method of getting a Mask from a surface.
trans-unit.target: 这是从表面获取 Mask 的更有特色的方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a stress test for the fastevents module.
trans-unit.target: 这是对fastevents模块的压力测试。

trans-unit.source: This is an in place operation that directly affects the pixels of the PixelArray.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个就地操作,直接影响PixelArray的像素。

trans-unit.source: This is not needed for normal pygame usage.
trans-unit.target: 这对于正常的pygame使用是不需要的。

trans-unit.source: This is not quality 'ui' code at all, but you can see how to implement very non-interactive status displays, or even a crude text output control.
trans-unit.target: 这根本不是高质量的 "用户界面 "代码,但你可以看到如何实现非常非交互式的状态显示,甚至是一个粗糙的文本输出控件。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly difficult under Windows.
trans-unit.target: 这在Windows下尤为困难。

trans-unit.source: This is the SDL library version represented as an extended tuple. It also has attributes 'major', 'minor' & 'patch' that can be accessed like this:
trans-unit.target: 这是表示为扩展元组的SDL库版本。它还具有属性“主要”，“次要”和“补丁”，可以像这样访问：

trans-unit.source: This is the full and final example from the Pygame Tutorial, "How Do I Make It Move". It creates 10 objects and animates them on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 这是Pygame教程 "如何让它移动 "中的最后一个完整的例子。它创建了10个对象,并在屏幕上制作了动画。
